Text: Work from anywhere.

Name: Heather Elias
Text: Remine is a real estate platform for 1.1 million agents and today we launched a banner in our app that says “We must take action to end systemic racism in our country.” With a link to 6 resources helping this cause.Additionally, Remine now officially celebrates Juneteenth as a Holiday. On June 19, 1865, the Emancipation Proclamation was delivered in Texas, which was the last state to declare all slaves free. It’s one of the most important days in our Country's history. I encourage you all to use this day to attend a march, protest on social media, engage with the Black community, donate to or volunteer with a BLM organization fighting racism and center yourself in deep reflection.

Name: Heather Elias
Text: Real estate friends, read this now. Let's all be part of the solution. We had a chance last year when the Newsday report came out, and it didn't happen. Thank you for writing this, Dave. I'm work on being better and doing better, and I'll do my part to help fix this industry.

Name: Heather Elias
Text: Real estate friends, read this now. Let's all be part of the solution. We had a chance last year when the Newsday report came out, and it didn't happen. Thank you for writing this, Dave. I'm work on being better and doing better, and I'll do my part to help fix this industry.

Name: Heather Elias
Text: I wrote down a stream of consciousness and my thoughts on real estate and racism, along with 3 actionable steps we can take to going in the right direction. I think it's worth your time even if you are not in real estate. Check it out.  #realestate #realtor #windermere #homeownership #windermereabode

Name: Heather Elias
Text: In preparation for the U-20 World Cup,We went through some pretty grueling endurance training.For one session in particular, we ran a dozen 800m’s in under 2.5 minutes each, in a row. 2.5 minute rest in between.Pretty brutal. Still can feel how exhausted I was.Thing is, we had one player go down.But not because of injury.Because he feigned an injury to get out of the session.Everyone knew it.Our coach let him go from the camp immediately.And it took some serious convincing for the player to make his way back to the squad.Now, he was one of our best players, and already one of the best in the world at his position.Any of you who follow soccer would likely recognize him.To his credit, and I admire this greatly, he came back a different player. On a mission.He went on to play for the full US National Team, and at some top clubs in the English Premier League.But our coach didn’t hesitate. He sent a very clear message to all of us.He wouldn’t compromise our values. For anyone.See, you can’t treat anyone differently on the team, or let some get away with things that others can’t.Don’t care if it is a top performer. Doesn’t matter.You do that, you lose credibility. Fast.DM me if interested in guessing who this player was.#leader #values

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: To accelerate digital transformation in Austria, we announced plans to establish our first cloud region in the country and our commitment to train 120,000 people in digital skills by 2024.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today we’re launching Azure Space. A thriving ecosystem of satellite providers is essential to meet the world’s growing network needs, and together with SpaceX and SES Satellites, we’re expanding our offerings to provide access to satellite data and connectivity from Azure – and help address the mission needs of the space community.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re excited to partner with the Consumer Technology Association, applying our technology, partner ecosystem, and learnings to help deliver the first-ever, all-digital CES in 2021.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re partnering with Verizon to bring the power of the cloud and edge to their 5G network, so businesses can deliver fast and secure 5G applications to their customers.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: "If you can come into a situation, that is ambiguous and uncertain, and bring clarity, that's leadership," said Satya Nadella in our recent conversation. Inspiring how he transformed and leads Microsoft – a real visionary.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: As we celebrate our AI breakthroughs – including image captioning – we are committed to translating them into capabilities for every developer with Azure AI.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: What a beautiful example of how technology can help maintain human connection and time-honored traditions in the most difficult of circumstances.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Last week, I had the great opportunity to speak to Microsoft's CEO Satya Nadella via Teams! Together, we discussed how to intensify the collaboration between #Microsoft and #DBSchenker. The focus of the first executive meeting of its kind was on #digitalization, #artificialintelligence and #cloudstrategy in logistics.Thank you very much Satya Nadella! I enjoyed our virtual meeting and our in-depth exchange.Stay tuned. There is more to come!#digitalvaluecreator #dbschenker #microsoft

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: When we build AI, we must do so responsibly. We are expanding our efforts to ensure AI models are inclusive of all communities, including people with disabilities.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Our extended partnership with Rockwell Automation aims to solve manufacturing operations challenges by delivering solutions that help industrial customers become more  resilient and digitally agile through #cloud technology

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today is World Teachers' Day! We’d like to celebrate by recognizing our educator heroes who have continued to support their students – and each other – through the big changes, tough challenges, and hard-earned victories. ❤

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today marks an important milestone in our 28-year history in Greece. We are announcing our commitment to accelerate digital transformation and innovation in the country, with plans to establish our first datacenter region there, as well as a skilling initiative to support new employment opportunities for today and tomorrow’s workforce.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: With the new innovations in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, you’ll get—✅ A comprehensive view of customers✅ Powerful AI-driven insights✅ Unmatched data privacy✅ And moreKnow your customers like never before with a real-time customer data platform: https://msft.it/6040TvAYj

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today, we introduce new members to the Microsoft Surface family - Surface Laptop Go, updates to Surface Pro X, and new accessories. Proud of the team for introducing these products at a time when the PC is more essential than ever. Take a look.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: COVID has exacerbated economic inequity, which is why we’ve launched a global skills initiative to reimagine how people learn and apply new skills. To date, we’ve helped 10 million people who have lost their jobs gain digital skills for in-demand jobs, and as Ryan Roslansky explains, it’s just the start.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: In a world where employees can easily feel isolated, we need to equip them with the tools to rebuild social capital, focus, and stay healthy. We’re adding new wellbeing features to Microsoft Teams, including integrations with apps like Headspace, to help people reduce stress. Here’s my conversation with Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe on why it’s important to practice mindfulness in the flow of work.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re expanding our partnerships with operators – bringing the power of the cloud and edge to their networks, taking an ecosystem-wide approach, and helping them reduce costs and increase revenue – so that together we can unlock new scenarios in a low latency, 5G world.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: My virtual visit to Australia this week was like an entire cricket Test series compressed into a Oneday. From the Australian Ballet in Melbourne using Teams to reimagine how they dance, to BHP using HoloLens and Dynamics 365 Remote Assist to keep employees in the Pilbara safe, it was fantastic to meet with so many people and organizations across the country who are using digital technology to not only stay open for business but to innovate. I’m looking forward to expanding our partnerships with organizations across Australia as they use our platforms and tools to digitally transform.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Insightful chat with Satya Nadella on the future of work. I think we've all experienced the need for even greater concentration in video meetings than face to face and the associated toll on our energy levels. As a result here at Swiss Re (and I'm sure elsewhere) we're looking at employee well-being now more than ever. https://lnkd.in/d8aiGp2Microsoft Swiss Re #RVS2020

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re expanding our partnership with Telstra and bringing together the power of Azure and Telstra’s network to create new opportunities for businesses across Australia.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: The case for tech intensity has never been more urgent, and we’re adding new capabilities across our tech stack to help every organization be resilient and transform in a world of unprecedented constraints. #MSIgnite

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Looking forward to #MSIgnite tomorrow, where we’ll be sharing how anyone can reach new heights with our platforms and tools. I hope you’ll join us!

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We must protect our most finite resource – the planet – by work towards a more sustainable future, which is why we’re announcing our commitment to be water positive by 2030.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Three billion people look to gaming for entertainment, community, and achievement and our ambition is to empower each of them, wherever they play. Today is a step forward on that journey as we welcome the beloved studios and franchises of Bethesda to Xbox.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: My heart goes out to Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s family and loved ones. She was a trailblazing jurist, and champion of gender equality and justice for everyone. Her legacy will live on through future generations.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: What a great honor for the Fed Cup to be named after tennis trailblazer Billie Jean King. We’re partnering with Billie and the International Tennis Federation to apply technology to shape the future of the sport for coaches, players, and fans.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: This #HispanicHeritageMonth, we’re celebrating the tenacity and resilience of the Hispanic and Latinx community – and highlighting stories of their important contributions and enduring strength.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: From work to socializing, our lives are operating at a distance from one another. So what does that mean for our work relationships and culture? I asked Frances Frei about this dynamic, and in this #PeopleTalk, she explains how we can both sustain and reimagine our organizational cultures to be more flexible and inclusive - and have our differences cherished. #growthmindset #culture

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Bill Gates Sr. is an important part of the Microsoft story; he helped shape our culture, played a vital role in our community, and influenced our philanthropic programs. We send our condolences to the Gates family and gratitude for Bill Sr.’s enduring legacy.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re helping the National Football League (NFL) reimagine the gameday experience for players and fans and keep operations safe this season, using the power of Teams and Surface.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: To help its service technicians efficiently repair and maintain its models, Mercedes-Benz USA is outfitting authorized American dealerships with HoloLens 2 headsets.The devices are equipped with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Remote Assist, a mixed reality app that lets users collaborate during hands-free video calls from their own computers.Learn more: https://msft.it/6001TtyG1

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We must level the playing field and ensure that skills training and economic opportunities are truly accessible to all. Learn more about Microsoft’s new grant opportunity for Black-led nonprofits focused on digital skills and workforce development here: https://lnkd.in/g_Tw7YY #DigitalSkills

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Congratulations to the grand prize winners of our hackathon, a team which created a customizable digital assistant built as an extension for Microsoft Edge. This year, we had more than 65,000 virtual participants – a testament to the dedication, ingenuity, and passion of our employees around the world.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Harness the power of your voice and save time and effort with #Microsoft365. Now, you can record your conversations directly in Word for the web and transcribe them automatically. Learn more: https://msft.it/6044Tqy7u

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Thank you to all of the Microsoft employees who are contributing their expertise to help us navigate COVID as a company and support our customers on the frontlines of this crisis.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Very proud to be work with our friends at Universal and DreamWorks on bringing production workflows to Azure and creating industry solutions for content creation in the cloud.  #azure #microsoft #universalstudios #dreamworks

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Microsoft Flight Simulator brings together the power of our technology – from Azure and Bing Maps to Xbox Game Pass – so you can visit the places you love and dream of exploring – no actual travel required.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Watch. This short film was created entirely of user generated content. It celebrates hopes, challenges, and dreams of the individuals that make up Microsoft, and the humanity and mission that unites us. Watch the full version of One Day, One Microsoft: https://msft.it/6046ToAmQ

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: With Surface Duo, we’re unlocking the power of two screens and bringing together the best of Microsoft 365 and Android to help people be more productive in a multi-sense, multi-device world.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re celebrating the contributions of the Indigenous community at Microsoft with the launch of our newest employee resource group, which will foster awareness of Indigenous cultures and help us shape more inclusive technologies.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re expanding our partnership with Samsung, introducing new experiences that enable your devices to work together seamlessly across work and play.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Learn more about how we’re collaborating with Mastercard to accelerate innovation across digital commerce and startup ecosystems with the power of #Azure and #AI

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: 🔴🟢 Kicking off today!🟡🔵Our 2020 global #MicrosoftHackathon looks a little different this year. More than 30,000 employees—alongside customers, nonprofits, and teachers—across 19 times zones in more than 80 countries are all coming together using Microsoft Teams.We can’t wait to see what you create!

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Microsoft is collaborating with PepsiCo to begin a new era of operational agility and innovation. Read more on how our partnership will accelerate developments across PepsiCo’s operations and consumer experiences.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Excited to partner with the NBA to completely reimagine the game experience with Microsoft Teams Together mode. So fans can feel like they’re together from the safety of their homes and players experience the energy of cheering fans in the arena.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: In honor of the 30th Anniversary of the Americans with Disabilities Act, we are sharing stories and perspective from disability advocates, on how we can all help foster more inclusive teams and workplaces.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Our partner ecosystem is critical to our customers’ success, and today we’re introducing new capabilities across our tech stack to enable them to help organizations drive digital resilience and transformation during this time of unprecedented change.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Microsoft and Finastra are joining forces to accelerate digital transformation in the financial services industry. Learn how #Azure is enabling next-generation applications to unlock the power of finance for everyone on Finastra’s FusionFabric.cloud. Here’s my conversation with Finastra CEO Simon Paris on our new strategic agreement. https://lnkd.in/eAiJPuV

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: In a world where we’re adapting to “remote everything,” customers are embracing change and new technologies to become more resilient. Some great examples include FedEx, UnitedHealth Group, Walgreens Boots Alliance, Volkswagen AG and others

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We had the pleasure to have Satya Nadella with us at our virtual leadership event a few weeks ago, joining the top 350 executives of our bank. Microsoft had to adapt to a dramatically changing technology landscape and it did so with great success. They are a technology partner of Santander (this conversation was, in fact, recorded using Microsoft Teams). And at Banco Santander  we too have a clear purpose and culture - what Satya calls ‘the why’ and ‘the how’ in this clip - that guides our continued transformation in the digital age. There is a third pillar, the what, that is about strategy, priorities, and delivery. We have made great progress at Santander over the past five years by paying attention to all three, our mission, our culture and delivery against a clear strategy. Thank you, Satya, for sharing your views and experience with us.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: ICYMI: My conversation with Microsoft’s Satya Nadella aired last night on Behind the Glass: Soul to Soul with Steve Gleason. We discussed fatherhood, living with purpose, Microsoft’s commitment to empowering people with disabilities, and what it means to “hit refresh”. Watch here: https://lnkd.in/gY54R9y #soultosoul

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Games have the power to bring us together. As we embark on this next generation, #Xbox is committed to making gaming more inclusive, immersive, and connected than ever before. More from Phil Spencer, VP of gaming: https://msft.it/6046TmCEg

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Congratulations to these incredible entrepreneurs. We’re partnering with Melinda Gates and Mayfield Fund to invest in female founders leading the way in innovative technologies.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Together with Land O'Lakes, Inc., we’re work to apply the power of Azure and its AI capabilities to help address some of the most pressing challenges facing the agriculture industry, including helping farmers increase their profit potential and develop more sustainable practices, and providing rural communities with broadband access. Here’s my conversation with CEO Beth Ford on our new partnership.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re partnering with Citrix to apply the power of Azure to reimagine how and where work gets done, helping customers seamlessly and securely connect their employees to their applications, so they can be more agile and productive wherever they are.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: The financial services sector has always been at the forefront of digital transformation. The new five-year strategic partnership between NAB Group and Microsoft will see us work together to co-design, develop and invest in multi-cloud technology powering payments and improving customer experience. National Australia Bank and Bank of New Zealand will use Microsoft Azure as the primary cloud for next 1000 applications, to boost resilience, speed and innovation. Together with NAB and BNZ we will build a multi-cloud architecture allowing those applications to run on a secondary cloud if necessary. Here’s my conversation with NAB Group Executive Technology and Enterprise Operations, Patrick Wright, on our partnership. Ross McEwan Steve Day Ahmed Mazhari Jean-Philippe Courtois Jason Zander#digitaltransformation #cloud #azure #financialservices

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Congratulations to each of our Microsoft Partner of the Year Award winners, finalists and nominees! Thank you for your ingenuity and commitment to empower our customers and have impact in your communities.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: As we adapt to new ways of work and learning, we’re gaining a better understanding of what makes people feel more connected. Today we’re introducing new experiences in Teams to make our virtual interactions more natural and engaging, like Together mode – being together, despite being apart.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: One form of recurring inequity which affects Black people and other marginalized communities is access to technology. Grateful to Microsoft for committing to solve this and empowering employees to act. Special thanks to the accessibility advocates and leaders I have learned from including Jenny Lay-Flurrie, Kris Hunter, and Bryce Johnson. I would also like to thank Kaitlyn Jones, John Porter, Julia Carlson, and Jay Trzaskos for our work together. We are grateful to Panos Panay and Phil Spencer for encouraging our project. I also appreciate the support of my managers Linh Kennedy, Randy Park, and John Meyer and the Microsoft Aspire program leaders Caroline Cho and Valerie Anderson who encouraged me to share this reflection.  Anyone who has an interest in accessibility or is work in this area, it would be great to connect.  #accessibility #diversity #inclusion #diversityandinclusion #microsoft #microsoftaspire

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Together with Adobe, we’re expanding our work with Walgreens Boots Alliance to digitally transform their operations, applying the power of Dynamics 365 and Adobe’s Customer Experience Management solutions to deliver more engaging and personalized omnichannel experiences for their retail and pharmacy customers around the world.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: COVID has created both a public health and an economic crisis, and as the world recovers, we need to ensure no one is left behind. Today, we’re bringing together resources from across Microsoft, inclusive of LinkedIn and GitHub, to reimagine how people learn and apply new skills – and help 25 million people facing unemployment due to COVID acquire the skills needed for the most in-demand jobs.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: I’m excited to share we're rolling out new reactions, stickers, and backgrounders as a way to share your support with one another and share your views and how you’re feeling. For example, to show your support for moments such as Pride, or for one another.  This includes:* New support reaction to show your support for articles, posts, news or views* New stickers to add to your video, Stories (select markets) and images* Images to express yourself in your Profile background* Coming soon on Company Pages: Ability to show causes you supportWe hope these reactions will give you additional ways to show support for the issues, moments, and the people you care about.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: It is a privilege to partner with leading physicians, scientists and engineers at Johns Hopkins Medicine  as they use Microsoft #Azure and its #AI and #machinelearning to support continued advanced #research and breakthroughs in #precisionmedicine

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today, the Supreme Court issued an important decision for the country and for Dreamers everywhere, including many who work at Microsoft. We know how critical their contributions are to our company and nation, and we will keep fighting for a permanent solution.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: As we continue adapting to remote learning, it’s crucially important to keep students engaged and educators feeling confident. We’re thrilled to introduce new features in Microsoft Teams to support you in and outside of the classroom. https://msft.it/6048TYTyG

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today's Supreme Court decision is an important milestone in the hard-fought journey for equal treatment for LGBTQI+ people in the workplace, building on the foundation set by the Civil Rights Act of 1964. As the court noted in its majority opinion, “Sometimes small gestures can have unexpected consequences. Major initiatives practically guarantee them. In our time, few pieces of federal legislation rank in significance with the Civil Rights Act of 1964.” While there is much more to do to achieve equal rights and inclusion, let’s use this decision as a catalyst to drive progress in our society.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: At this time, we will be using our platform to amplify voices from the Black and African American community at Microsoft.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: At this time, we will be using our platform to amplify voices from the Black and African American community at Microsoft.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: At this time, we will be using our platform to amplify voices from the Black and African American community at Microsoft.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: At this time, we will continue to uplift voices from the Black and African American community at Microsoft.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: There is no place for hate and racism in our society. Empathy and shared understanding are a start, but we must do more. I stand with the Black and African American community and we are committed to building on this work in our company and in our communities.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Yesterday, in our monthly Employee Town Hall, we addressed an issue that is causing deep pain, anger and anxiety for so many of our employees -particularly the Black and African American community. I was especially moved by the sentiments from our CEO, Satya Nadella, who shared his thoughts on showing empathy and compassion, and how each of us can come together to drive change in our communities and the world. One thing is for sure – we can’t be silent. In that spirit, I want to share Satya’s remarks because I felt they were universal - applying beyond Microsoft and our employees - so I asked Satya to allow me to share an excerpt from his comments.Lauren Gardner, Brad Smith, Jenny Lay-Flurrie

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Now when an interested ally asks me, ‘what can I do’…I feel differently. I am too tired to carry this alone, now I am ready to put people to work.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Recent tragedies impacting the black community are powerful reminders that we need real change. As a company, we’re focused on using data, technology, and our voice to advance criminal justice reform. https://lnkd.in/gKDc_EC #GeorgeFloyd #ChristianCooper

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: The impact of the world outside of the workplace affects the way that any of us can show up, be creative, innovate and do great work for our companies. With the added complexity of uncertainty, fear, and horrible acts of identity-based hate that happen around the globe every day and to many communities, we need to be even more intentional not to exclude, and put greater focus and effort into making sure we include.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Time flies! Today marks the 10th anniversary of #AbilitySummit and our first virtual, open to public event. This years event has new meaning. Accessibility has never been more important. Technology is the route to information, connection and productivity. The power of #AbilitySummit is the learning from sharing expertise from the #disability community to inform and guide advancements in #accessibility. Lets continue to collaborate to accelerate. We are #BetterTogether. https://lnkd.in/gmAQaw8

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We have so much to learn from our partners all over the world when it comes to closing the skills gap and preparing employees for jobs in the aftermath of the COVID crisis. This week, Trevor Noah and I are joined by ⚡ Frédéric Bardeau 🚀to learn how Simplon.co is empowering people in France (and beyond!) with the digital skills they need to succeed - at no cost to trainees. This Teams chat kicks off with some bonus content from Trevor’s special guest. I'm sure many of you can relate to the situation!

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We've been inspired by the selfless work of people across many sectors, work together to save lives by scaling up #COVID convalescent plasma. We are trying to do our part in support of this heroic work.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Broadband already powers much of our modern lives, but COVID has acted as an accelerant, forcing essential activities online. Those without access to high-speed internet – as many as 42 million Americans according to a new study, and many of them in rural areas – are at risk of being left behind. We can’t ignore this gap. Here’s why:

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Today we’re celebrating Global Accessibility Awareness Day as we continue our journey to use technology to design a more accessible world for the 1 billion-plus people around the world with disabilities. #GAAD

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Incredibly excited to welcome the Softomotive (https://lnkd.in/gD3_Sr5) team to Microsoft. This creates the industry's only full-spectrum automation platform - combining the power of UI automation and API automation in a single platform, supported by hundreds of connectors and the limitless power of Azure. And although the power is unmatched, we're also transforming the economics of RPA and business process automation - delivering via an easy-to-adopt cloud + edge service and with radically more affordable pricing versus the competition.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: I’m always impressed by the ingenuity and passion of Imagine Cup teams to build a better, more connected world. Congrats to our 2020 Champion, Team Hollo, which is addressing a big challenge, and applying AI to make mental health care more accessible.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: The role of developers has never been more important, from emergency response and recovery, to reimagining the way we live and work. And across our tech stack – from GitHub and Power Platform to Azure and Microsoft 365 – we are creating new opportunity for developers to build the world we all want to live in.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: I’m inspired by how developers at Carhartt and so many other organizations have stepped up and been there when their employers – and the entire world – have needed them the most.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: I'm thrilled to announce our strategic alliance with Microsoft as we work together to transform the end-to-end commerce experience. Our work together will dramatically improve visibility and agility across the global supply chain, and today is only the start. #TeamFedEx

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Now more than ever, organizations are counting on an efficient and capable supply chain to remain competitive and open for business. Together with FedEx, we will apply the power of Azure, Dynamics 365 and their AI capabilities to this urgent need, building new experiences that transform logistics for our mutual customers around the world. Here’s my conversation with FedEx CEO Fred Smith on our new partnership. https://lnkd.in/gWg29py

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: New, free resources for students & educators! Join us on your journey to learn new tech skills. Plus, next week at #MSBuild we have the Student Zone with over 30 sessions curated for young student developers with content on Minecraft, MakeCode, Visual Studio, GitHub, and so much more! #MSBuild is totally free, so sign up today and bring a friend!

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Thank you Jane, for sharing your reflection on identity and diversity for #AsianPacificAmericanHeritageMonth. An important reminder that each of us has a different journey, story and perspective worth celebrating.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: To all the moms out there making this new way of work work. #MicrosoftTeams #HappyMothersDay

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: I’m grateful to all of the educators who are applying their ingenuity and creativity to keep students engaged and connected during these challenging times. Thank you! #TeacherAppreciationWeek

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: We’re investing $1.5 billion in Italy over the next five years, as part of our commitment to accelerate the country’s digital transformation.

Name: Satya Nadella
Text: Just last week, Accenture became the first organization to surpass half a million users of Microsoft Teams, and we are work together to help businesses adapt to a world of remote everything. I talked to CEO Julie Sweet about what she has learned in the process and how she is thinking about digital transformation going forward. Here’s our conversation.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Avoiding a climate disaster is one of the biggest challenges we face today. And although it will be very hard to do, I believe it’s possible. I’ve been work for some time on a book about what we need to do over the next decade to make it happen. I’m excited that it will be published on February 16.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Did I get the job? Stephen Curry interviewed me for an engineering role at Microsoft. We also talked about the impacts of COVID, technology, and education. Watch the full interview: https://b-gat.es/3nMkIDw

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Did I get the job? Stephen Curry interviewed me for an engineering role at Microsoft. We also talked about the impacts of COVID, technology, and education. Watch the full interview: https://b-gat.es/3nMkIDw

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Thanks to the pioneering work of this hero, the world is making progress against this often-forgotten disease: https://lnkd.in/dEei6Bh

Name: Bill Gates
Text: To avoid the worst effects of climate change, we need new zero-carbon ways to generate electricity, grow food, make things, move around, and keep warm and cool. But knowing what we need to accomplish is very different from knowing how to do it—or even whether we can.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: For the last 25 years, Dr. Firdausi Qadri, an immunologist and infectious disease researcher in Bangladesh, has been work to protect entire communities from cholera epidemics.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Understanding this concept will help the world make the most of its efforts and funding as we work together to avoid a climate disaster.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’m excited to see this kind of innovation. Detecting and predicting outbreaks earlier is critical to preventing epidemics.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The only way to eliminate the threat of COVID somewhere is to eliminate it everywhere. By making sure poor countries are equipped to stop this disease, wealthy countries will help themselves and bring this crisis to an end sooner.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The investments we make in primary health care in Africa can:- make communities far healthier- achieve health equity- stop the next pandemic before it gets largeHere’s how: https://b-gat.es/307b0BJ

Name: Bill Gates
Text: We can end the pandemic everywhere if we can commit to a solution that includes everyone.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: To prevent the worst effects of climate change, we need innovation across all sectors—especially in the hardest to decarbonize sectors—to get us on a viable path to net-zero emissions.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: My father’s death is a tremendous loss for our family and the many people whose lives he touched. Dad lived a long and enormously meaningful life. I never stopped learning from his wisdom, kindness, and humility. Melinda and I owe him a special debt because his commitment to serving the community and the world helped inspire our own philanthropy. Although he would be the last person to say it, my father’s compassion and generosity will live on in the foundation he helped build. As I’ve said many times before, my dad was the real Bill Gates. He was all the things I strive to be.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Thank you to the heroes everywhere work to keep us safe. I hope their stories inspire you just as much as they have me: https://lnkd.in/dXUGmpf

Name: Bill Gates
Text: These heroes represent the best of who we can be. Their efforts to solve the world’s challenges demonstrate our values as a society and they serve as powerful examples of how to make a positive difference in the world.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: How did Nepal make such remarkable progress on children's health? And what can other countries learn from its success?

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Clinical trials are critical to helping researchers better understand Alzheimer's. Improving how we identify and enroll participants in those trials will accelerate progress on diagnosing and treating the disease.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I tackle every big new problem by asking two questions: Who has dealt with this problem well? And what can we learn from them?I used this technique at Microsoft, and I still use it today. They seem like obvious questions, but sometimes it's surprisingly hard to find the answers—especially when it comes to global health. We launched the Exemplars in Global Health program to help fill the gap.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: If we’re going to address climate change, we need to find new ways to do things that don’t release greenhouse gases—including how we move around.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Bill Gates, you thoroughly understand the CO2 logic of the mobility sector. You know what we have to do and you could and should advise governments how to regulate and what to promote: As you say, it’s not too complicated – electric vehicles wherever possible:all passenger cars,most of the delivery vans,most of public transportation,carbage collection. Long haul on biofuels,2nd or 3rd generation produced out of waste or residuals - like we do at Scania Group. And you rightly do not talk about hydrogen fuel cells for the transport sector with their low efficiency and the 3 times higher energy demand compared to EVs. Synthetic fuels which are also highly energy intensive to produce will - even fully scaled up - remain very expensive but will be needed in transportation which can’t be electrified like planes.In my personal view,would be better to go ahead with motor racing:F1 becoming CO2 neutral using synthetic fuels is much more excitement,fun,racing experience,tech-competition than Formula E driving a few laps in city centers in gaming mode.All of this only makes sense if we get carbon-free electricity soon. It’s possible. But Germany’s target date to exit coal power only by 2038 is for a rich,tech-leading country by far not ambitious enough.Well thought,well written, Bill Gates!

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Better and cheaper batteries will hopefully make EVs a realistic option for every car owner. QuantumScape (which I’m invested in both on my own and through Breakthrough Energy Ventures) is work to commercialize the next generation of battery technology: https://lnkd.in/e-uFFFm

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Today, the Africa Regional Certification Commission officially certified that, four years after the last identified case in Nigeria, Africa is now officially free of wild poliovirus. Five of the six World Health Organization regions, representing over over 90% of the world’s population, have now eliminated wild polio. This moment was decades in the making. In 1996, wild polio paralyzed more than 75,000 children across Africa. Today, thanks to the heroic efforts of countless people, from hundreds of thousands of vaccinators and community volunteers to program managers to Heads of State, wild polio is now gone from the region. To help commemorate this historic announcement, Michael Galway and Violaine Mitchell, two senior staff at the foundation who spent more than a decade work with many countries to end polio, reflect on the meaning of today and the journey it took to get here.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Today we move one step closer toward a world without polio. This is an incredible milestone that’s worth celebrating. It is also an important reminder of what can be accomplished when we work together toward a common goal.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The COVID pandemic has reminded us how much innovation is needed to prevent a climate disaster.How exactly do we fuel our need to move around without emitting greenhouse gases? The answer is simple, even if making it happen won’t be: use clean electricity to run all the vehicles we can, and get cheap alternative fuels for everything else.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Would you put your arm in a cage with 500 hungry mosquitos? Fredros Okumu is volunteering his blood as part of an effort to find new ways to control mosquito populations and prevent malaria: https://lnkd.in/dDJScMZ

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Mosquito City is home to the world’s largest captive colony of mosquitoes. Ifakara Health Institute is doing fascinating research there about mosquito behaviors and finding ways to outsmart them.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Ridding the world of preventable, treatable diseases like malaria will save millions of lives and lead to healthier, more prosperous communities. And that will make them better prepared to confront any new health challenges like #COVID in the future: https://lnkd.in/gPvTiti

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The progress the world has made against malaria is one of the greatest success stories ever. The COVID pandemic only reinforces why eradicating malaria is so essential.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: This is still the world’s deadliest killer: https://lnkd.in/dm2Pqrt

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Hello LinkedIn!👋 I’m excited to share my 1st LinkedIn post as the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation’s President of Global Policy and Advocacy. As I take on this role, I can safely say that the work our partners and grantees are doing has never been more critical. COVID is challenging health systems, pushing more households into poverty, and rapidly changing the frontiers of online schooling. But we’ve come together as a global community before to face other challenges and bring positive change for millions, and I believe we can do that again. I look forward to connecting with other optimists from across the world.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: By 2025, two-thirds of all jobs in the US will require some education beyond 12th grade. Our foundation is expanding our partnerships with three organizations that give students the support they need to get, and stay, on a path to a college degree.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Teaching special education takes an amazing person to figure out exactly what works for each child. Talking with Washington State Teacher of the Year Amy Campbell gave me an even greater appreciation for these educators: https://lnkd.in/duUUpvG

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Our foundation is partnering with DonorsChoose to support teachers as they get ready to go back to school—in whatever form that takes—and will boost your donations to the classroom project of your choice today.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I always look forward to meeting Washington’s Teacher of the Year. This year’s recipient, Amy Campbell, is a remarkable advocate for her students, and I loved learning about her approach to teaching special ed.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The world did not do enough to prepare for a pandemic. We can avoid making the same mistake with climate change by:1. Letting science and innovation lead the way2. Making sure solutions work for poor countries too3. Getting started now

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Even as the world works to stop the novel coronavirus and begin recovering from it, we also need to act now to avoid a climate disaster.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Science and innovation will help us beat COVID. Dr. Fauci explains why.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Investments in digital technology that strengthen Africa’s food and health security will be critical to help the continent recover and thrive after the pandemic.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: This hero is playing a critical role in Kenya’s preparations to tackle COVID by scaling up medical oxygen supplies that will be needed to keep the most critically ill patients alive: https://lnkd.in/dxhQ4su

Name: Bill Gates
Text: This hero is playing a critical role in Kenya’s preparations to tackle COVID by scaling up medical oxygen supplies that will be needed to keep the most critically ill patients alive.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Here are five books to read this summer if you want to learn more about pandemics or are looking for a distraction: https://lnkd.in/eWBzmFF

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Abhijit Banerjee and Esther Duflo are two of the smartest economists work today. You can read an excerpt from their new book, Good Economics for Hard Times, on my blog. It’s a compelling look at the human dynamics behind many of the political divisions and policy debates in wealthy countries like the United States.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: This is one of the best business books I’ve read in several years. Iger does a terrific job explaining what it’s really like to be the CEO of a large company. Whether you’re looking for business insights or just an entertaining read, I think anyone would enjoy his stories about overseeing Disney during one of the most transformative times in its history.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Most of my conversations these days are about COVID and how we can stem the tide, but I’m also often asked about what I am reading and watching. Here are my 2020 summer book recommendations (plus a few other ideas for things to do at home).

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’m hopeful that this program will improve our understanding of the coronavirus outbreak in Seattle and provide valuable information about the virus for other communities around the world.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: There are over 100 different coronavirus vaccine candidates in the works. These candidates take a variety of approaches to protecting the body against COVID. To understand what exactly that means, it’s helpful to remember how the human immune system works: https://lnkd.in/eFaFc8Z

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Humankind has never had a more urgent task than creating broad immunity for coronavirus. It’s going to require a global cooperative effort like the world has never seen. But I know we’ll get it done. There’s simply no alternative.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The #coronavirus pandemic pits all of humanity against the virus. The damage to health, wealth, and well-being has already been enormous. This is like a world war, except in this case, we’re all on the same side. Everyone can work together to learn about #COVID and develop tools to fight it.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: We don't yet have all the tools we need to stop the novel #coronavirus and safely re-open the economy. But they are on the horizon.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Trust experts. Focus on the needs of vulnerable people. Disease outbreaks aren’t gender neutral, so our response can’t be either. I write about 3 principles that should guide the #COVID response—and explain why your efforts may have already saved lives.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: There’s no question the United States missed the opportunity to get ahead of the novel #coronavirus. But the window for making important decisions hasn’t closed. The choices we and our leaders make now will have an enormous impact.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’m inspired by the generosity of everyone who has contributed to this effort to help keep kids learning at home. Thank you to DonorsChoose and especially the educators who are doing amazing things for their students every day.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: One of the questions I am most often asked about the #COVID pandemic is how, and when, it will end. This article by Ed Yong does a really good job of outlining the steps we need to take.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: This impressive new tool from the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation will help hospitals, policymakers, and the general public better understand and prepare for the #COVID response in the U.S.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Following public health guidance can help stop the spread of COVID, which is why I’m answering the World Health Organization’s call to join the #SafeHands Challenge.  It also gives me a chance to share three things that are on my mind as we all go through this difficult time.1. We need to listen to science and public health experts. Social distancing and washing our hands are our best tools right now to prevent the spread of the virus and ease the strain on our health system.2. So many people are suffering because of this pandemic, so let’s support each other and support the most vulnerable in our communities.3. Have compassion for yourself and others. Find ways to take care of yourself, and be sure to check in on your friends and family.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: There are few people I’ve learned more from over the years–especially about viruses–than Peter Piot. This Q&A with him is an excellent, easy-to-understand primer on #COVID: https://b-gat.es/2QT0UzF

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Teachers are doing incredible work to keep kids learning while at home. To help get supplies to the teachers and families most in need, Melinda and I will double your impact, up to $1 million total, when you give to DonorsChoose coronavirus relief effort today and tomorrow.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Thanks Reddit for joining me yesterday to discuss the #COVID pandemic and what we can do to prevent the next one. Here's a recap of the conversation: https://lnkd.in/eYnVfsC

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I have made the decision to step down from both of the public boards on which I serve – Microsoft and Berkshire Hathaway – to dedicate more time to philanthropic priorities including global health and development, education, and my increasing engagement in tackling climate change. The leadership at the Berkshire companies and Microsoft has never been stronger, so the time is right to take this step.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: We don’t yet have all the tools we need to fight COVID. This is an important step toward having treatments, while we also explore vaccines and diagnostics. Thanks to Wellcome Trust and Mastercard for launching this effort with us.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: COVID has started to behave a lot like the once-in-a-century pathogen we’ve been worried about. The good news is that governments and public health agencies can take steps over the next few weeks to slow the spread of this virus and help us respond more effectively and efficiently when the next epidemic arrives.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Stunting affects children’s physical development, increasing their chances of dying and reducing their quality of life. It also affects brain development, which means stunted children are less likely to do well in school and less likely to be employed as adults.Dr. Kopano Matlwa Mabaso is leading an incredible effort to eliminate child stunting from South Africa over the next decade.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Tackling climate change is going to demand historic levels of global cooperation, unprecedented amounts of innovation in nearly every sector of the economy, widespread deployment of today’s clean-energy solutions like solar and wind, and a concerted effort to work with the people who are most vulnerable to a warmer world. It’s a complicated challenge but I believe we can avoid a climate catastrophe. Here’s how: https://lnkd.in/exYJtZG

Name: Bill Gates
Text: When Warren Buffett donated the bulk of his fortune to our foundation and joined us as a partner in its work, he urged us to “swing for the fences.” All these years later, that advice still guides how we think about our philanthropy: https://lnkd.in/eHWc_Nh

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Diseases that cause dementia are only diagnosed after symptoms start. To effectively treat these diseases, we need to be able to diagnose them decades earlier when they first take hold in the brain.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Our foundation has focused on strengthening #education systems because we believe that public education is a driver of equality.We’re hopeful that our work with Networks for School Improvement will increase the number of Black, Latinx, and low-income students who graduate from high school and pursue postsecondary opportunities. Here’s why that’s so important: https://lnkd.in/ez6Ssbg

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The only way we'll achieve net-zero carbon emissions is if we innovate, deploy, and invest across all sectors. It's encouraging to see companies work to get our planet one step closer. Congratulations to all the winners of the #BreakthroughCanada initiative.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: People often ask me which technologies have the most potential to change human lives in the decades ahead. Two of the ones I always put at the top of the list are #artificialintelligence and gene therapy. But we’ll only make the most of that potential if we make sure that these tools reach everyone who needs them, including the poorest people in the world.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Some of the very first investments we made as philanthropists were aimed at correcting inequities in global #health. Here’s why: https://lnkd.in/eX_8FNR

Name: Bill Gates
Text: When we first started our foundation, Melinda and I were optimistic about the power of innovation to drive progress—and excited about the role we could play by taking risks to unlock it. Twenty years later, we’re just as optimistic, and we’re still swinging for the fences: https://lnkd.in/eWZ5Q6J

Name: Bill Gates
Text: On my first day as CEO at the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, I'm reflecting on the huge responsibility that comes with this job. Knowing that we at the foundation can't achieve our ambitious goals alone, I am deeply committed to building our community of partners and to ensuring that our culture at the foundation enables the impact we aspire to have. Building a community is easy to say, but I know that it will take a lot of work. So I've set myself a goal to take the extra time to connect with colleagues and partners, to listen to their experiences and ask them, and myself, the tough questions. I am especially excited to spend my first week as CEO in South Africa, where I was raised and where exposure to apartheid first instilled in me a desire to use the advantages afforded to me to help tackle injustice and inequality. I can't think of a better place to start this next chapter in my career (and I'm pretty happy that it gives me a chance to see my parents as well).

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The world has made incredible progress in reducing child mortality in the last twenty years. I recently talked to Reid Hoffman about the partnerships and tools that have helped along the way.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: January is National Mentoring Month. I’ve been lucky enough to have a number of amazing mentors in my life — from Mr. Swanson and Mr. Long, who saw my potential in high school, to Dr. Meg McNamara, who leads the pediatric residency program at the University of California San Francisco, to Melinda Gates and Bill Gates, who have been mentors to me as Mark and I launched our philanthropy the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative.From all my mentors, I’ve learned that mentorship is a two-way street — both people need to be learning and caring for each other. For anyone who is looking for a mentor: Make sure you are pulling your weight in sharing your learnings from your life journey. We all have so much we can give and learn from each other!#mentoring #mentorship #mentors

Name: Bill Gates
Text: The world has only begun to tap into all the ways #ArtificialIntelligence will help people live healthier lives. I’m excited about the launch of Microsoft's new AI for Health initiative, which connects researchers and organizations with world-class AI talent and resources.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Tune in now as we unveil our newest #AIforGood initiative and share how AI will help solve some of the world’s most pressing issues.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: These global health heroes have helped Bangladesh become a model for other countries for how to respond to infectious disease outbreaks: https://lnkd.in/euywdNS

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I had a fascinating conversation with Vaclav Smil about the fallacy of predicting the future based on a #growth curve: https://lnkd.in/eQgmbNb

Name: Bill Gates
Text: For twenty years, Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance has worked to ensure that every child in the world is protected from preventable diseases. The results are incredible. But their work is far from done. There are still too many children -- many living in some of the hardest-to-reach places on the planet -- who aren’t getting basic vaccines. Gavi is the best tool we have to reach them.  #VaccinesWork

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Thanks to the work of this father–daughter dynamic duo, Bangladesh is moving toward a future of fewer disease outbreaks and more children reaching their fifth birthday.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: America’s tax system will be top of mind for many in 2020. Here’s what I really think.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’m glad Beautiful News is highlighting some of the amazing things happening in the world.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Nobody sees the big picture quite like Vaclav Smil. His latest book Growth is a brilliant synthesis of everything we can learn from patterns of growth in the natural and human-made world. #economics

Name: Bill Gates
Text: What’s next for our foundation? I’m particularly excited about what the next year could mean for one of the best buys in global health: vaccines.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: December is a great time to take stock of everything you’ve done over the last twelve months—including all of the books you’ve read. I found these books to be really clever and engaging. I hope you them find as intriguing as I did: https://lnkd.in/egVhn33

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Back in my early Microsoft days, I routinely pulled all-nighters when we had to deliver a piece of software. I even stayed up two nights in a row on occasion (I don’t recommend that). This book taught me a lot about the importance of a better night's sleep.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Preparing our kids for college, a career, and life is a long journey. And as any parent or teacher will tell you, it’s not always easy. Diane Tavenner has written a wonderful guidebook to help all of us make the most of the adventure. #education

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’ve read a lot of great books this year. Here are some I think you’ll enjoy reading over the holidays.

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I’m honored to be among such inspiring company on the #LinkedInTopVoices list for 2019.Thank you to everyone who read, discussed and shared my pieces this year. I’d love to know who your favorite people to follow are on LinkedIn—who has inspired you this year?

Name: Bill Gates
Text: I really enjoyed sitting down with Reid Hoffman to talk about the role great cofounders and partners have played in my career, like Paul Allen at Microsoft and Melinda at the Gates Foundation. You can listen to our conversation here: https://b-gat.es/33RY4yu

Name: Bill Gates
Text: Technology has made it faster and easier than ever before for people everywhere to give. I’m inspired by how many people from all over the world participate in Giving Tuesday: https://b-gat.es/2YbWAhn

Name: Richard Branson
Text: Holly  spoke to Lauri-Ann Ainsworth, CEO of the Branson Centre of Entrepreneurship - Caribbean and their unofficial ‘Wellness CEO’ about how to find better work-life balance: https://virg.in/a3Z #VirginFamily

Text: I’m pleased to be joining with Richard Culatta and others from the education world and beyond to help build a #NewEducationStory with Big Change. Whatever the future holds, our teachers are the experts and should be the ones to shape the #FutureOfTeaching.

Name: Richard Branson
Text: Virgin Hotels Chicago has been awarded the coveted title of number 1 Hotel in Chicago" - the third time the property has earned this honor - while Virgin Hotels Dallas has been named the number 16 Hotel in Texas," ranking as the number 5 property in Dallas in the Condé Nast Traveler's 2020 Readers' Choice Awards. https://prn.to/2SwthUF #virginhotels

Text: More than 40.3 million people are trapped in slavery worldwide and 1 in 4 of them are children.Read Richard Branson’s thoughts on modern slavery and what we’re doing to combat it at Virgin: https://virg.in/aw5 #AntiSlaveryDay

Name: Richard Branson
Text: Every single business, big or small, faces risks and challenges from modern slavery and every business has a part to play in ending it. Let’s come together to create the kind of world we want to live in – the only one that we will accept. https://virg.in/aw5

Name: Richard Branson
Text: How to trade burnout for balance according to Lauri-Ann Ainsworth, CEO of the Branson Centre of Entrepreneurship - Caribbean.Such a fascinating conversation about wellness, balance, building up the 'whole entrepreneur' and how this aligns with my views on #Education. Here's more: https://virg.in/a3Z #Wellness #Entrepreneurship #Balance #Leadership #CEO

Name: Richard Branson
Text: We've been busier than ever these last few months, putting in a TON of work to move quickly and efficiently through our biggest milestones on the path to Launch Demo 2. Refinements to our team, our processes and our hardware after our first flight are paying off big time. Each major operation thus far, from cryo load to engine acceptance testing, has been *so much faster and smoother* this time around.This week in particular is really exciting for us. For the very first time in our company’s short history, customers have arrived in Long Beach to get their payloads processed for launch! While they’re on-site, we’ll work with each team to complete a final round of checkouts.Pretty soon, we’ll bring everything we need for launch — rocket, payloads and ground support equipment — up to Mojave Air and Space Port. There, like before, we’ll turn a bare taxiway into our launch site, and prepare for our adventure to orbit.Check out our latest blog for a more thorough update from our team!  https://virg.in/aJY

Name: Richard Branson
Text: “50 years eh? Who’d have thought........Actually, you probably!” Loved receiving this letter from one of Virgin’s first customers https://virg.in/a34

Name: Richard Branson
Text: We've been busier than ever these last few months, putting in a TON of work to move quickly and efficiently through our biggest milestones on the path to Launch Demo 2. Refinements to our team, our processes and our hardware after our first flight are paying off big time. Each major operation thus far, from cryo load to engine acceptance testing, has been *so much faster and smoother* this time around.This week in particular is really exciting for us. For the very first time in our company’s short history, customers have arrived in Long Beach to get their payloads processed for launch! While they’re on-site, we’ll work with each team to complete a final round of checkouts.Pretty soon, we’ll bring everything we need for launch — rocket, payloads and ground support equipment — up to Mojave Air and Space Port. There, like before, we’ll turn a bare taxiway into our launch site, and prepare for our adventure to orbit.Check out our latest blog for a more thorough update from our team!  https://virg.in/aJY

Name: Richard Branson
Text: And we're off! 🙌🏽 Kicked off the virtual #STRIVEChallenge this weekend with a 55km cycle and a 10km run!🏃🏼‍♀️ I had to cut the 100km route short because of a technical issue with the bike so it looks like I'll be having to do it all over again! While 2020 sent STRIVE in a very different (virtual) direction, it is pretty amazing to be joined by nearly 100 strivers from four continents! 🌎 We'll be completing the five legs of the challenge over the next five weeks and sign-ups will remain open throughout so there's still time to join us!👌🏼Every pound raised will go directly towards supporting 10 pioneering education projects through the Big Change Emergent Needs Fund - responding to the urgent needs of young people, parents and teachers throughout the #COVID pandemic, whilst also laying the foundations for long-term positive change for the next generation. This is what's going to keep me going over the next five weeks! You can sign up right here: bit.ly/VSC20Info

Text: Peace is one of the most essential things we all need to thrive. Without it, it’s impossible to learn, create or innovate. Thrilled to be a part of the Peace One Day online event, to hear from so many inspirational speakers and help spread the message of peace around the world. Come and join us: www.peaceoneday.org #PeaceDay

Name: Richard Branson
Text: 69% of people who launched a business during the #COVID crisis said that the pandemic gave them the time and space they needed to get going – really interesting research from Virgin StartUp on what has motivated entrepreneurs during the pandemic: https://virg.in/bms

Name: Richard Branson
Text: The pandemic may have thrown a wrench into your business plans and changed your outlook. But at the heart of it, that’s what entrepreneurship is all about: taking risks, overcoming adversity, adapting, embracing failure – and pulling yourself up again. Thrilled to attend a virtual Fast Track 100 event and celebrate the wonderful achievements of the UK’s fastest-growing private companies even in a climate of great uncertainty: https://virg.in/bBy #VirginAtlanticFastTrack100 #entrepreneurship

Name: Richard Branson
Text: Fascinating new book Terra Incognita by Ian Goldin and Robert Muggah who explore humanity's impact on the planet, and the ways in which we can make a real impact to save it, and to thrive as a species https://lnkd.in/d_wDWZq

Name: Richard Branson
Text: My wonderful wife, Joan. We’ve been leaning on one another for over 44 years now.

Name: Richard Branson
Text: I’ve had the pleasure of chatting with best-selling author Simon Sinek Inc. on many occasions, usually when we’re cycling up a mountain for the Virgin Strive Challenge. He is an unshakeable optimist and I’m delighted that he will be taking centre stage at Virgin StartUp’s next digital MeetUp to share insights on how to build and lead effective teams, what drives consumer behaviour, and why we should all feel optimistic about the future of business. Tickets are free but space is limited: https://virg.in/bsW

Name: Richard Branson
Text: Lovely hearing from one of the auticon team in Australia on the challenges he’s faced and how auticon has helped him overcome them: https://lnkd.in/dm2j2y9 #Aspergers #Autism #Neurodiversity

Text: My new book club Reading with Richard with Literati starts October 1. Join by Sept. 17 to read with me:

Name: Richard Branson
Text: The last two months at Virgin Galactic have been filled with some truly amazing moments.I understood coming in that part of our vision is to create life-changing transformational journeys by enabling people to experience the wonder of space.  What I hadn't appreciated until a few weeks in is that this vision is part of a greater purpose embedded into the DNA of Virgin Galactic.Read some thoughts on why our mission will lead to a changed perspective that will create good back here on Earth.

Name: Richard Branson
Text: The pandemic may have thrown a wrench into your business plans and changed your outlook. But at the heart of it, that’s what entrepreneurship is all about: taking risks, overcoming adversity, adapting, embracing failure – and pulling yourself up again. Thrilled to attend a virtual Fast Track 100 event and celebrate the wonderful achievements of the UK’s fastest-growing private companies even in a climate of great uncertainty: https://virg.in/bBy #VirginAtlanticFastTrack100 #entrepreneurship
