Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: At Thrive Global, we are about moving from awareness to action as we work to end the burnout epidemic. While our work is based on the latest neuroscience, we also infuse storytelling and role-modeling in our whole-human approach. This post from Christophe Desproges helps demonstrate why. Thank you for sharing your story with others, Christophe.

Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: "During difficult moments of upheaval, resilience takes on a whole new meaning.  It's less about thriving and more about surviving.  Can we learn to shoulder the storm while keeping our well-being intact?  Yes, we can!" — Dr Aditi Nerurkar

Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: Yesterday I had the opportunity to present Thriving Mind, some digital course built by Thrive Global (created by Arianna Huffington) and Stanford medicine to some colleagues of mine from across the globe. This course aims at helping people build mental resilience and improve emotional well-being to navigate the increased stress so many of us experiencing right now.We ended up talking about mental issues and I shared my own story of burnout and what I was doing outside of work on the topic to help others.The call ended and someone pinged me to thank me as he had been in denial for too long, was never happy in life. He said something that stuck with me: “If you can, I would say never stop what you are doing. Maybe it will not resonate with everyone but with those who it does it can make a big change.”The same day I attended an online webinar about stress relief with great content about stress hormones, etc. The speaker then talked about the importance of gratitude and the power of giving. It immediately clicked and thought about that comment in the morning.Yes talking about Burnout is not fun but as long as my story can help even one person, then I will take it as my mission in life.#Burnout #Thriving

Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: If you've found yourself in back-to-back-to-back Zoom meetings, you know about virtual fatigue. That's why Thrive Global is teaming up with Zoom on the Thrive Reset Zapp. With personalized or pre-loaded guides, you can soon use the Thrive Reset Zapp at the beginning of a meeting to start out fresh, in the middle of a meeting to stay focused, or at the end to help you recenter before moving onto your next Zoom. And it only takes 60 seconds! Watch the video below to see how it will work and learn more here: https://lnkd.in/erHA7y3 #Zoomtopia#wfh #wfhtips #burnout #stressmanagement #mindfulness

Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: At Thrive Global, we use the Dot Collector from Ray Dalio's Principles to reinforce our top cultural value, Compassionate Directness, by offering transparent feedback in real-time. So I'm excited to see that Dot Collector will be joining Thrive Reset as a Zoom Zapp! As Thrive Global's Chief Training Officer Joe Hubbard often says: feedback is a data-point. And it's a crucial one that Dot Collector will help us give right from within a Zoom meeting. But if we find ourselves ruminating over some constructive feedback — we can course-correct before that stress becomes cumulative. #Zoomtopia

Name: Arianna Huffington
Text: Join me and Tiffany Shlain (Webby Awards founder, Emmy-nominated filmmaker) to discuss the paperback release of her bestselling book 24/6: Giving up Screens One Day a Week to Get More Time, Creativity, and Connection on Tuesday Oct 20th 5pmPT/8pm ET. We’ll discuss building mental resilience and prioritizing our well-being both in the pandemic and in our 24/7 screen-filled world. Excited to hear more about Tiffany and her family’s decade-long practice of no screens from Friday night to Saturday night for what they call their Tech Shabbat. Text: We all have that inner voice of self-doubt and self-judgment—a voice that questions everything we’re doing. Name: Tony Robbins
Text: “Limited goals create limited lives. You need to stretch yourself when setting goals. Breakthrough all limitations. Envision with precision. You need to be able to describe in specific detail what you really want. I always ask the question: If you knew you could not fail, what would you pursue? What would it look like? What actions would it require? What would it take to bring your vision to reality?”Thank you, Thrive Global!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Excited to announce my new book with financial expert Peter Mallouk — THE PATH — is out!! 📚💥>> Pick up your copy here: http://tonyr.co/thepath << It’s no secret that we’re experiencing some of the greatest financial upsets in modern history and more change is coming. For those of you who follow my work, you’ll know what I mean when I say, Winter is HERE! You may be wondering how you will come out of this with your finances, your savings, investments, and retirement plans for the future intact.Peter and I want to help guide you and provide the information and tools to help you achieve financial freedom, even in these uncertain times. The strategies we’ve shared in THE PATH are written without any confusing industry jargon so that no matter what stage of life you're in or where you're starting from, you can understand and apply these insights immediately to start making a positive shift in your personal finances.Many of you may be familiar with the last book, Peter and I collaborated on, the NYT Bestseller UNSHAKEABLE! The Path is even more relevant and powerful, especially given the drastic economic climate we’re all trying to adapt to.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: As a business owner, you know that winter isn’t downtime. Winter is your training ground when you prepare and strategize for growth because spring always follows. You take action. We want to ensure you have all the tools you need to make the most strategic decisions possible right now, so you can emerge victorious from this winter. In these short-form videos, you’ll get strategic advice from some of Tony’s most highly requested Business Mastery event speakers. This content will help you pivot your revenue streams, innovate within your business, communicate with your teams, and meet or exceed changing client needs.   Get started now - and don't forget to share this series with other business owners who could benefit!

Text: 𝗝𝗼𝗶𝗻 𝗧𝗼𝗻𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗯𝗯𝗶𝗻𝘀 𝗟𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗢𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝟮𝟮, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟬. 🚨 http://sr-upw.com/eu 🚨What’s your story looking like right now in this new normal? Is it empowering you, or is it preventing you from living a happy, fulfilled life?Unfortunately, we are often wired to focus on the painful experiences and let them define the current state of mind and the way our lives must turn out. It’s time to break out of that pattern and take action towards empowerment. Join us for UNLEASH THE POWER WITHIN VIRTUAL (UK Timezone)! Unleash the Power Within Virtual will enable you to:🛑 Confront all your fears and uncertainty in the new normal 🔎 Identify your greatest passions with laser clarity ⚡️ Learn how to focus your energy on what you truly want, not what you fear 🚀 Get the tools for creating the life you were meant to lead Discover the power to break through any limitation, overcome any challenge, and create the quality of life you desire. Unleash the Power Within Virtual is happening October 22-25, 2020 >>> http://sr-upw.com/eu

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Marketing isn’t just about doing something unique – it’s about adding more value than anyone else in the game. Doing more for your customer than anyone else. And in this episode, we’re taking you to Business Mastery, where you’ll hear about Darcy, a woman who is struggling to find her niche, even despite an impressive resume of clients! Listen as Tony shows Darcy how to move out of her own way and eliminate the beliefs that are holding her back. And learn exactly how you can start to find your unique niche, and start building the brand that will take your company to the next level. Because if you do what everyone else is doing but better, you’ll only get an incremental return. But if you do what no one else is doing, you’ll find geometric rewards. Isn’t it time you stepped up your game?

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Marketing isn’t just about doing something unique – it’s about adding more value than anyone else in the game. Doing more for your customer than anyone else. And in this episode, we’re taking you to Business Mastery, where you’ll hear about Darcy, a woman who is struggling to find her niche, even despite an impressive resume of clients! Listen as Tony shows Darcy how to move out of her own way and eliminate the beliefs that are holding her back. And learn exactly how you can start to find your unique niche, and start building the brand that will take your company to the next level. Because if you do what everyone else is doing but better, you’ll only get an incremental return. But if you do what no one else is doing, you’ll find geometric rewards. Isn’t it time you stepped up your game?

Text: We all get into business to win – but the key to winning in any business is to align with your true nature.

Text: A single individual driven by a purpose can change the world.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Sara Blakely, founder and CEO of Spanx, shares how failure has been a catalyst to her success – and how she uses it to learn, grow, and see the upside in everything.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: We’re experiencing some of the greatest financial upsets in modern history.You might be wondering how you possibly come out of this with your finances intact.But with the right guide, you can actually do much more than that.Everything you need to achieve financial freedom, even in these crazy uncertain times, is laid out step by step in Tony’s brand new book co-written with financial expert Peter Mallouk called “The Path”!<< PRE-ORDER YOUR COPY HERE: http://tonyr.co/the-pathThe strategies laid out in its pages are written without the confusing industry jargon so that you can understand and apply them immediately to make a positive shift in your personal finances. Tony and Peter’s last book, UNSHAKEABLE, sold out over and over again… we couldn’t even get copies for our team for MONTHS!This new book is even more relevant and powerful, especially given the drastic economic climate we’re all trying to adapt to.When you pre-order your copy today, you will also get three exclusive bonuses valued at over $300… plus a surprise bonus! The book officially launches to the public on October 13th… so hurry and get your copy before they’re all claimed!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: In case you missed it...take a look at this glimpse into the digital classroom of last month's FIRST-EVER Tony Robbins’ VIRTUAL BUSINESS MASTERY program!We went full tilt for 5 days & nights with 2,300 business owners and entrepreneurs representing 63 countries around this world for a total immersion experience and as you can see we had a blast doing it!! We learned and grew all week together PLUS we joined hearts across the miles in our common humanity to raise a $1.3 MILLION DOLLAR contribution pledge to END HUMAN TRAFFICKING.If you missed this one and you’re ready for your own business breakthrough, you can now register to join us for the next one as we just released the date for our next Business Mastery Virtual program: 🗓 March 20 - 24, 2021.Click here to schedule it and save your spot today:

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: We’re teaming up with Operation Underground Railroad and Love Grenades to help make an even bigger impact in our mission to #endchildtrafficking. Our friends at Love Grenades just launched their “Sound of Freedom” dog tag necklace.Here’s why: Years ago, during a raid, OUR founder, Tim Ballard rescued a 5-year-old boy and his 12-year old sister from the horrors of sex slavery. While at the crime scene, the little boy gave Tim an old dog tag that Tim later learned had been a gift from his sister to her little brother in a symbol of hope — a joint prayer that one day they would be rescued. The young boy asked Tim to keep it and to this day, the dog tag is a symbol of his promise and mission to rescue enslaved children throughout the world.For every Sound of Freedom dog tag purchased, $50 will directly benefit OUR and help to support their life-saving work. That means, for every 30 tags sold, we can rescue one child from sex trafficking, and provide the aftercare services they need.The #FreedomDogTag is a symbol for all who wear it. Our message to the world is that we, too, will continue fighting for their rescue, because all those children trafficked and enslaved are not forgotten. Support O.U.R. through your purchase of a Freedom Dog Tag today: https://lnkd.in/dA-VX_j

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Hats off to this little girl and her family for using such creativity and caring to help families in need!I recently heard about a Feeding America fundraising campaign started by a father-daughter duo. Back in March when their town went into quarantine, they started recreating famous movie scenes at home to pass the time. This simple and fun family activity did so much more than keep the kids busy — thousands of views later, they realized that they could use their new-found platform to help raise meals for those in need through Feeding America. Within a few months, they managed to raise over $12,000! Sage and I were so deeply touched by this awesome example of taking ACTION, and CONTRIBUTION, and being a FORCE FOR GOOD all while having family FUN that we doubled their funds raised when we heard about it. As many of you know, hunger relief is something that I’m very passionate about. I am so proud of our partnership with Feeding America. Together we’ve raised nearly 600 million meals and we’re well on our way to hitting our 1 BILLION meal goal!If you feel called to support, please join us on our mission to provide meals to families in need. Donations to my 1 Billion Meals Challenge will be matched $1 for $1, just click here: https://lnkd.in/g_EKvqc

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: The world has changed faster than any of us could have imagined and now we have TWO OPTIONS...We can either learn how to pivot and be "In The Know" about what works in this new economy and world...Or wait around for things to go back to normal and take the risk of getting left behind.Here's the truth... The strategies, tools, and secrets for success RIGHT NOW are completely different than they were 6 months ago.So who knows these new secrets? How can we learn to pivot?Join me and our team of experts on September 17th for our FREE Power to Pivot Virtual Immersion Workshop and learn from the very few people on the planet who have pivoted so fast that they are THRIVING right now.Save your spot NOW!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: What an honor it was to be the keynote speaker at the Jeunesse Global Expo last week in Orlando.Much love and gratitude to this amazing team for the invitation to host a 3-hr master class for 40,000 participants from just about every corner of the globe — 150 countries were represented in our virtual theatre!I was so touched by the generosity and company culture that Jeunesse has created. It is truly a family affair! Wendy Lewis and Randy Ray are the dynamic husband-and-wife duo who founded the company, and their son, Scott, has worked his way up through the ranks and is now their Chief Visionary Officer helping shape the future of Jeunesse.Randy and Wendy emerged from retirement to create Jeunesse (now a global billion-dollar brand!) driven by their desire to help bring people together. Not only are they providing opportunities for personal empowerment, they’re also committed to serving with a focus on making a meaningful difference in the lives of children across the world. So far, they have funded global villages, hospitals, and schools and continue to support a number of initiatives that seek to give children in need a brighter future.It was a privilege to be a part of your annual Expo, thank you Scott, Wendy & Randy and everybody at Jeunesse!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Nineteen years later on September 11, we remember and honor our brothers and sisters — the heroes — pilots, passengers, community members, firefighters, police officers, medics, first responders, members of our military, rescue animals, and other guardian angels who, with unwavering courage and humanity, put their lives on the line to save others.We remember heartbreaking stories of goodbye calls made to loved ones that remind us that, ❤️ IN THE END LOVE is TRULY ALL THAT MATTERS.We remember those we lost and pray a special blessing today for all those who lost their mothers, fathers, brothers, sisters, aunts, uncles, children, and loved ones.We remember and continue to be inspired by incredible acts of compassion between total strangers, and the countless volunteers who stepped up from every part of our great country to come to the aid of those in need. We remember that no matter the pain, tragedy, or injustice of a circumstance, the resilience, strength, and light of the human heart and spirit cannot be extinguished.Today, we remember and honor the memory of those whose lives and legacies we shall #neverforget. 🇺🇸❤️🗽

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: This Labor Day we give thanks for the gift of our labor in all forms. Whatever work we do, we do not labor for ourselves alone, but for the common good of all.We ask that all who labor in professions, marketplace, factories, fields, restaurants, gas stations, waste management, for those who care for the sick, for those who nurture the elders, those who educate the youth, those in offices, transportation, and family living alike, may ALL be blessed for the gifts of your unique contribution to our communities. Thank you for your love, dedication, committed hearts and service.There is nothing that we do that does not affect the world around us, thank you to each of you for your puzzle piece that blesses each of our lives.For those who are retired, we honor your lifetimes of labor. And for those in search of employment today we send out a special blessing that you may be guided to joyful opportunities to give of your hands and heart.Finally, for all the men, women, and children throughout the world who work enslaved in injustice, we lift you up today and pray for your safety and freedom. 🙏#labordayweekend #laborday #laborday2020

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Experience Tony Robbins' brand new Unleash The Power Within Live Virtual 360 Interactive Experience, Sep 17-20, 2020 AUSTRALIA (AEST).BOOK NOW: https://upwvirtual.com.au/Now is not the time to let the new normal hold you back. Let the challenges of these new times unleash an unseen potential inside you. Tony will show you how to focus your energy on what you truly want, not what you fear so you can create the life you want even when outside circumstances try to hold you back!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: We can get better results with ourselves and others by asking better questions. One proven strategy is to use an OUTCOME FRAME. If you ask someone, "What’s bothering you?" or "What’s wrong?" you’ll usually get a lengthy dissertation on just that, THE PROBLEM.But if you ask them, “What do you want?” or “How do you want to change things?” you’ve redirected the conversation FROM THE PROBLEM, TO THE SOLUTION.In any situation, no matter how dismal, there’s a desirable outcome to be achieved. 👉Your goal should be to change direction TOWARD THE DESIRED SOLUTION and AWAY FROM THE PROBLEM. Do this by asking the right questions.   Here’s one more important frame... Don’t ask your kid WHY he is having trouble with his algebra. Ask him WHAT HE NEEDS TO DO to perform better.“Why” questions can get us explanations, justifications, and excuses. Good communicators aren’t interested in rationalizing why something is going WRONG. They want to find out how to do it RIGHT.Asking better questions will always lead us in the right direction.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: "The secret to handling change is to focus on progress. If you can make progress on a regular basis, then you feel alive." - Tony Robbins

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Where FOCUS goes, energy flows!Remember – what we FEEL is a result of what we’re choosing to FOCUS on.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Each breath, each moment, each day is an opportunity to be renewed, to LET GO of the PAST, and to recognize that LIFE is always happening FOR us.Yesterday is gone, and we truly don’t know whether tomorrow will come.TODAY is a new day, a new beginning full of POSSIBILITY. Today is more precious than we can even comprehend!All we ever have to do is open our eyes to THE GIFT of life around us.Freedom comes by knowing the TRUTH. Claim the truth of YOUR UNLIMITED NATURE today! ✨

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: By changing nothing, nothing changes.MASSIVE ACTION is the cure-all.Real leaders are effective agents of LASTING CHANGE.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Every single person on this planet has the ability to tap their PERSONAL POWER and CREATE the life they DESIRE. A life of MEANING.💡❤️🌊📝🕹🌏.It all starts with a simple but CRITICAL QUESTION: What is it that you want❓What are you REALLY after and WHY?? Do you have a CLEAR picture of what it is that you DESIRE most — in your relationships, your health, your business... in YOUR LIFE? 💭.What do YOU want to GIVE?.Your life will transform when you are able to answer that question with CLARITY, CONGRUENCY, CONVICTION, and a COMMITMENT to the highest standard..CLARITY is POWER. Clarify what it is you really WANT at the level of your SOUL. The more clear you are about what you want - what you DESIRE - the easier it is to MAKE your VISION a REALITY. 👀🧠🎯 It all starts with DE-SIRE — a word with Latin roots that mean: of the (heavenly) Father. A reminder that our biggest goals and deepest aspirations answer a call to grow and serve— a call that is driven by something so much BIGGER THAN OURSELVES. 🙌.So... What is it that you REALLY want to CONTRIBUTE in this LIFETIME? Leave a comment and let me know.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: That’s a wrap on our first-ever BUSINESS MASTERY VIRTUAL! This program certainly came at an interesting time. If you’ve been a student of my work or studied any of my business programs, you know I always talk about WINTER. “Winter is coming.” Well, winter is HERE!What I didn’t anticipate was a winter filled with so much fear, not only financially, but with a global challenge unlike anything most of us have ever gone through in our lives.Here’s the thing 👉  CRISIS either destroys you or RECREATES YOU.So what are we going to do? Here at #BusinessMastery, we learn how to PIVOT, INNOVATE, & THRIVE in the middle of an intense winter. We train ourselves emotionally, because even though winter is tough, it presents some of the greatest opportunities. In fact, the most successful companies were started in winters!Not only did you make a difference in your own lives and businesses, you showed up in a BIG way for others. This week we pledged over $1.3 MILLION to Operation Underground Railroad—that will free approximately 1,005 children from the horrors of sexual slavery.Were you part of the FIRST VIRTUAL BUSINESS MASTERY? Leave a comment & let me know: What was YOUR #1 takeaway?

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: 🔭  CREATE A VISION TODAY and never let: ❌ THE ENVIRONMENT of conditions, ❌ other people’s LIMITING BELIEFS, OR ❌ what has been done IN THE PAST limit 👉 YOUR DECISIONS.👈BE FREE and CREATE NOW.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: We are living in interesting times...It is absolutely the MOST EXCITING time to be alive, and yet, the pressures of modern life have turned DISAPPOINTMENT & EMOTIONAL DISCOMFORT ➡️into a habit,STRESS ➡️into a lifestyle,and INSTANT GRATIFICATION ➡️ into an addiction to numb the pain.But like most everything in this world💥PAIN has its PURPOSE.PAIN 🚩 is a red flag 📢 CALLING US to ACTION.While mere dissatisfaction may prompt us to take small steps, real LASTING CHANGE requires MASSIVE ACTION and taking risks that put us out of our comfort zone... None of which we’re willing to undertake until we hit that threshold of pain— the EMANCIPATING MOMENT that can change it all.The moment you realize that the fear of staying where you are now is worse than actually making the leap into the realm of uncertainty and something different, THAT is the moment your life changes!If you want to take the island, 🏝🔥🛶 you gotta burn your boats!Pain 🧨is a warning sign to get your attention and MOVE YOU.MASSIVE ACTION is the CURE-ALL!...Have you ever been mobilized to action by a threshold of #pain in your life?

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: THE CHALLENGE IS HERE NOW.When we stop growing, life gives us a challenge to make us grow.It’s not where we were, it’s where we choose to GO NOW my friends.❤️💪 🎩 👑#BusinessMastery

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: The mind wants us to settle, but our hearts and souls are called to be more...to give more - appreciate more, to enjoy every moment of this gift called life!

It almost feels like I’m in your living rooms with you.I can’t wait to share more with you from here as the week goes on. ⚡️👊💥🙌❤️#businessmastery

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: LIFE is truly a gift! 🎁 And it is our privilege to have the opportunity to create an EXTRAORDINARY life!A life of CONTRIBUTION, MEANING, HAPPINESS, PASSION, FULFILLMENT, and LOVE! 🙏🔥😄❤️🙌💯.Don’t wait another moment, another day, another year to LIVE FULLY and squeeze JOY out of your life!Remember, it’s NOT about being perfect, it’s about being REAL.We all have so many areas for GROWTH, but we can’t unless we’re willing to try things that don’t always work out.Life is messy— but it is also BEAUTIFUL.ENJOY your life and all of the growth AND CHALLENGES it demands from you. Then share the insights with those you love and support them along the way.Tag a friend you want to share this message with. 👇🏷

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: It’s no secret: these are challenging, changing times. My entire career I’ve been obsessed with serving people and helping make lives better. And right now, I want to do everything in my power to help you rise above and take advantage of new opportunities so you can thrive!I’ve worked with two of my dear friends to create a brand new free challenge that will show you the greatest path I know for business success at this time in history! SIGN UP HERE: https://lnkd.in/db56paQOur world has gone virtual and so many businesses have taken a hit because of it… but at the same time, the self-education industry has skyrocketed. People are hungry for your knowledge, your story and your experience… and they’re willing to pay for it.So I along with Dean Graziosi and Russell Brunson (creator of Clickfunnels) decided to host the 5-Day Build Your Brand Challenge to help you turn your knowledge into currency!In just 5 DAYS, you’re going to learn how to extract your story, package it into a product ready for the market, and then launch it to the world.You have value inside your head through your past, your experience and your knowledge…Let us help you unlock it, build it and share it in just 5 days (for free)!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: It’s no secret: these are challenging, changing times. My entire career I’ve been obsessed with serving people and helping make lives better. And right now, I want to do everything in my power to help you rise above and take advantage of new opportunities so you can thrive!I’ve worked with two of my dear friends to create a brand new free challenge that will show you the greatest path I know for business success at this time in history! SIGN UP HERE: https://lnkd.in/db56paQOur world has gone virtual and so many businesses have taken a hit because of it… but at the same time, the self-education industry has skyrocketed. Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Where FOCUS goes, energy flows!Remember, what we FEEL is a result of what we’re choosing to FOCUS on.Most people focus on how to avoid pain in the short-term. If we want to push our life to the next level and experience fulfillment and true quality of life we need to be laser-focused on our ultimate vision and our sense of mission — who we want to be, and how we can serve, and contribute.Focusing on that highest vision helps create energy and momentum. We can kick feelings of frustration or depression by changing the channel of our attention to how to help someone in need.It all begins with what you CHOOSE to FOCUS ON.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Courage. 💪The more you DO it, the more you DO it!The most exciting thing about this SUPER POWER is that you already possess it. 🦸🦸🏽‍♀️It's available to you NOW. In the very next moment we can use this mighty force if we merely muster the COURAGE to claim it.Remember: Our DIRECTION is what leads to a DESTINATION; and the COURAGE to TAKE ACTION consistently will move us in the DIRECTION of the FEW who do 🆚 the MANY who talk..#courage #habit #stepup #tonyrobbins #quotes

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Today was Relationship Day here at Date with Destiny, and as usual, it did not disappoint. Because what's more powerful than love? Nothing! ❤️ It's always so beautiful to watch 5,000 human beings from around the world connect to their ESSENCE -- their true nature, their core, their higher self -- and be free. 💥 Never forget the purpose of relationships is to magnify human emotion. Remember Lesson #1: It's not your partner, it's YOU. Take 100% responsibility today. It's not just who you choose to be with, it's who YOU choose TO BE in your relationships that counts! Master your meaning and show up in a beautiful state and see what happens. #DateWithDestiny #DWDFlorida2017

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: It’s our UNLIMITED POWER to CREATE and LOVE in ANY circumstance that makes the biggest difference in the quality of our lives.Show some ❤️ if you agree!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: If there’s a single belief that seems almost inseparable from success, it’s that THERE IS NO GREAT SUCCESS WITHOUT GREAT COMMITMENT.We see this in any field, even those where natural ability would seem to have the strongest hold. If you look at individuals with proven, LASTING success, you’ll find they’re not necessarily the brightest, or the fastest, or the biggest. You’ll find they’re the ones who are UNSHAKEABLE in their COMMITMENT.The great Russian ballerina Anna Pavlova once said, “To follow, WITHOUT HALT, one aim: there’s the secret of success.”.That’s it! That’s ABSOLUTE #COMMITMENT.Who’s coming to #BusinessMastery this week? What are you committed to?

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: “Life is a gift, and it offers us the PRIVILEGE, OPPORTUNITY, and RESPONSIBILITY to give something back by becoming more.”•Tag someone who you’d like to share this with today.🤝❤️

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: architect :a person responsible for designing, creating, and/or realizing a particular plan, project, or undertaking..Many of us have been hypnotized to believe that we play a powerless role in juggling whatever situations, conditions, or curveballs life throws our way. I suggest to you that YOU are the CREATOR of YOUR HAPPINESS and your life experience. YOUR decisions, actions, beliefs, and values have the power to shape your destiny. 👊💯💥.Whatever your grandest vision is for your future, remember — YOU have the power to take that vision and make it REAL. Even when it seems like everything is against you. 💪⚡️.So how about it... are you up for it? 👇Tag someone who needs to read this.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: The secret to handling change is to focus on progress. If you can make progress on a regular basis, then you FEEL ALIVE! 📈

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Do something TODAY to take your life to the next level. Step up!! 👊🏼🔥💪💯.What ACTION will you take?? Let me know in the comments👇

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: A relationship is NOT a place you go to GET, it's a place you go to GIVE.To those most dear to us we get to GIVE our ENERGY, our pure LOVE, and our open HEART. ❤️Let’s not wait to say I love you... to smile, to stay in our heart, to laugh together, to be completely present and connected.Why not take a moment now to decide how YOU will show up in your relationships every day.Who are YOU willing to BECOME for the ones you love?

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Life is a gift and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more. 💪💯 When we use our talents, passions, and the most impactful lessons we’ve learned to lift and serve one another on a deeper, more meaningful level, our souls know that this is truly one of the GREATEST GIFTS we can offer. 🙏❤️.👇🗯Leave a comment and share ONE personal learning that has played a part in creating massive impact and powerful shifts in your own life. If a story shared touches you, lifts you up, or inspires you to take action, LIKE IT — let’s show support for each other as we share our experiences. We’re all in this together, here to learn from each other, and keep growin’! 📈🤜🤛💥

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: RAISE. YOUR. STANDARDS. 📈Tag someone you want to share this with today.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Here’s the truth: What you GET in life will never truly make you happy long-term. What will is who you BECOME and what you CONTRIBUTE. 💪.The ultimate purpose of our personal growth and transformation is the unveiling of the unique gifts we are called to share with others. Nothing in life will give us a greater sense of personal satisfaction than contribution to something beyond ourselves. 💓🤝.Giving is the foundation of fulfillment; THE SECRET TO LIVING IS GIVING.🔥.🏷 Tag someone in the comments who you’d like to share this with. 👇＠

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: 🔭 CREATE A VISION TODAY and never let: ❌THE ENVIRONMENT of conditions, ❌other people’s LIMITING BELIEFS, OR ❌what has been done IN THE PASTlimit 👉 YOUR DECISIONS.👈BE FREE and CREATE NOW.👊

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: I’ve met lots of people who achieve their goals and are still miserable, depressed, angry, and unfulfilled.🏆😔😫🥴😡.That’s because pleasure only lasts for a moment or two. It’s in the body. It’s like eating cake. Happiness is in the mind. You get the grade, or the job, or the car. Someone gives you a compliment, or you win an Academy Award. It’s great but it doesn't last. Pretty soon it's just a statue on the mantle or a car in the garage, right?Only GROWTH and CONTRIBUTION give us FULFILLMENT and MEANING.Life wants us to GROW!🌱.The more we GROW the more we have to GIVE.REMEMBER: What you get will never make you truly happy, the whole game is who we BECOME.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: We must DISCIPLINE our disappointments!Disappointment can actually be very powerful FUEL to drive us to the next level.Has a stirring disappointment ever catalyzed action and change in your life, personally or professionally? 🤔🧨

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Hello there, it's Sage sending love to all!IN CASE YOU MISSED IT; Below is a link to an essay I wrote for Maria Shriver's The Sunday Paper.Thank you to our dear sister and friend on the path Maria who continues to be such a light in this world. Thank you for your grace, as well as the invitation to contribute to your weekly publication.I look forward to reading your thoughts in the comments below!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Sage and I feel immensely blessed to support the launch of FREEDOM GURU, the world’s first emotional wellness app singularly focused on inner freedom of the mind through self-awareness and reflection.Authored by two wisdom teachers and former senior monks with a combined experience of 50 years of personal growth and transformation, it was created with the intent to help assist you with A DAILY PRACTICE to cultivate beautiful states of being by freeing your mind even in times of external discord.Freedom Guru aligns perfectly with our core teaching and belief that EVERY PERSON deserves to live and create a life filled with LOVE, joy, peace and the ability to liberate one’s own mind from stressful, reoccurring thoughts.This is not only possible for all, but truly achievable with a daily practice.Creating this project has been dear to Sage along with our brother Praveen Kenneth whose Freedom Guru App 💫Journey To Freedom From Anxiety And Fear, launches TODAY.For 21 days, Sage will be leading you through an in-depth journey, to help guide you to be able to release states of fear, stress, and anxiety in order to open your life to greater intelligence, possibility, and cause-less joy.Please click here to download the app: bit.ly/2BuwUpg

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: BREAKING NEWS via Rony Tobbins: Attention parents and youth mentors! There has never been a time where our children are more in need of inner strength, emotional fitness, and a vision for a compelling future. For decades, parents have asked me to translate the tools I teach for the kids audience, and now is the moment. Enter my animated persona, RONY TOBBINS! Rony the gorilla and his cast of friends will bring a radical solution to empower kids and give them to the tools they need to maximize their potential and cultivate joy! Rony will take kids on a journey by teaching valuable life lessons and interview inspiration figures from sports to business to music and more. #RonyTobbinsGorilla aims to be the missing link in teaching kids the soft skills necessary to succeed in being fully alive!COMING EARLY 2021! Want exclusive SNEAK PREVIEWS and behind the scenes updates about #ronytobbins? TEXT +1 (619) 536-1410.P.S. Comment below what skills you wish you learned in grade school and any other ideas that will help us shape this character!

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: I just wanted to reach out to all 30,000 people that participated in THE FIRST EVER‼️ VIRTUAL‼️ UNLEASH THE POWER WITHIN event!WE MADE HISTORY TOGETHER! 🙌 ❤️ 👊 WHAT A WEEKEND WE SHARED! Thank you for inviting me into your homes. 🙏 It was an absolute honor to be your guest.We enrolled 🎟 22,500 ticket-holders 🎟  but the most magical part was seeing it become 30,000 as participants from 138 countries shared this experience with their roommates, partners, dogs, cats, kids, and sometimes the whole family!I've been so touched reading all of your messages today and hearing what this has done for the people that you shared this with — this was really a family experience and that is perhaps what moves me the most about this new format.I have so much gratitude for MY ENTIRE TEAM, the staff, and volunteers, and A/V production support work around the clock to make this happen. (Actually, six different companies came together and joined forces to pull-off this great feat in the last 2 and a half months!)You guys are relentless and you care as deeply as I do about serving the people we are so privileged to connect with. Thank you for your dedication, creativity, and love. 🤟This wouldn’t have happened without all of your efforts, I’m eternally grateful.

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: What an honor to be featured on the cover of Real-Leaders Magazine and its special edition this month — The Crisis Leadership Playbook — written to inspire leaders across industries from all walks of life to focus on using EVERY opportunity, EVEN CRISIS, to create something bigger and better. “In times of great uncertainty, LEADERSHIP is the most valuable skill you can have. Regardless of what’s happening around you as a leader, there’s a part of YOU that’s STRONG.Call on that part of you.The part of you that’s HUNGRY. The part of you that’s COURAGEOUS in the face of unfathomable fear. The part of you that WON’T PUT UP WITH EXCUSES.”I also share my Top 10 qualities of effective leadership during times of crisis in this issue. It just hit stands yesterday — check out the digital article and see how we #inspirethefuture. 👊💥🎯⚡️Read it here: https://lnkd.in/d3daWXc

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: Investing in the science of food is truly an investment in our future. I'm so proud to share that my partners at Prime Movers Lab have invested in Upward Farms, an aquaponic vertical farm in Brooklyn whose mission is to heal the food system and make high-quality food available and affordable for EVERYONE. I had the pleasure of meeting with the team last year when they came to Date With Destiny. It was wonderful to connect with CEO & Co-founder Jason Green and COO Johnny Bowman who share my mission of helping provide nourishing meals to families and using innovative, sustainable technology that also cares for our beautiful planet. Upward Farms grows microgreens, baby greens, and fish with the highest ecological and quality standards in the industry! Using their breakthrough methods, they produce more than TWICE the industry average for vertical farming with a fraction of the fertilizer (and no synthetic fertilizers!), eliminate plant diseases without pesticides, and prevent the growth of pathogens like E. coli without sanitizers. They are truly cultivating a food supply that is SUSTAINABLE, SCALABLE, and SAFE. I am so proud of this team and love your vision for GROWTH!Read more: https://lnkd.in/d9A6f85

Name: Tony Robbins
Text: God bless America! Happy 4th of July! 🇺🇸The spirit of grit, moxie, UNITY, opportunity, and the ongoing fight for FREEDOM FOR ALL is what we celebrate today. I am grateful for and humbled by our nation's past. May we commit to constant and NEVER-ENDING PROGRESS for this nation and BLESSINGS TO ALL ITS PEOPLE! Great leaders hold A HIGHER VISION even when faced with challenging times.WE THE PEOPLE ARE THOSE LEADERS, and I believe we have a responsibility to this country to make it the way we see it.What is your greatest vision for America?What is the possibility you see for the USA and all its people?What is the nation that YOU wish to create and are committed to bringing into existence?

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Attention Lawyers: Help ensure election integrity by work with We the Action to staff voter protection hotlines, function as an observer at voting locations, and engage in other volunteer opportunities to help rule of law win at the polls this year. #election2020 #vote2020

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: How do we make the future we want? That's the subject of geneticist and MIT professor Eric Lander's new podcast, "Brave New Planet." I was excited to appear as Eric's guest on two upcoming episodes.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Malala Yousafzai wrote about the kind of world she’d like to see for women and girls following the COVID pandemic on Evoke.  “I often say that my goal is to see every girl in school in my lifetime,” she writes. “But imagine that COVID is a turning point, a time when we invest in education like never before in human history, a time when we finally make good on so many years of promises.”Let’s recommit to centering girls and women in our response to COVID.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: I try to always be myself with my team, so that they know they can do the same. We had a lot of fun meeting pets, discussing American Ninja Warrior workouts, and sharing laughs today at 'The DL with DL,' an informal team-bonding session inspired by KIND CEO Mike Barkley's famous 'Banter with Barkley.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Two years ago today, I started at LinkedIn. My son was four days old, having arrived much earlier than anticipated. I left him with my wife to come in for orientation, and I will admit to being more than a little nervous. I was starting a new job in a new industry with colleagues I mostly didn't know well. 732 days later, I have discovered the most creatively and intellectually satisfying chapter of my career. It's an honor to work among entrepreneurial, visionary journalists deeply committed to bringing members the news and views that will drive their professional lives forward. And yes, I am still counting my time here in days because it still feels as though I've just arrived; as much as we've created in these past two years, the most interesting challenges are just ahead of us.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: So proud of you, Noosheen Hashemi!!

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: 102-year-old Bea Lumpkin wearing PPE to cast her vote-by-mail ballot.She hasn’t missed a vote since she began voting 80 years ago.Be like Bea.📸 IG: @ctulocal1

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: An IPO is often just the second inning of a company's story. That's why there's a need for "venture capital at scale" — patient investors who will partner with a CEO for the long term. That's where Reinvent enters the story.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: I am looking forward to the launch of the Podcast Brave New Planet by Eric Lander.  He always has interesting and important contribution to any good conversation.  Here's the preview.  https://lnkd.in/g2DHgJF

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: I could not be prouder of our Amazon legal team for the amazing pro bono work they have done to help our communities.  Congrats on being recognized twice by the Pro Bono Institute last week for our programs to help  immigrant children and homeless families. #AmazonJusticeLeague

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Only 8% of primary patent-holders are women... Come on ladies we need your ideas out in the world! Speak up, be willing to look ridiculous, you’ve got the ideas inside of you, write your own patent, and go for it. I had no idea what I was doing. When I got my idea I went to the Georgia Institute of Technology library everyday after work for a week and looked up every pantyhose patent since the 1800’s on their microfiche. I then went to Barnes & Noble, Inc. and bought a book on patents and trademarks. I wrote my own patent, my mom drew the sketch of the product idea (the original footless pantyhose) and I was the model in the sketch. I had a lawyer write just the “claims” for a discounted fee and bam 💥 I got the official patent number two years later and I was an inventor! Add it to your bucket list... invent something... even if you don’t do anything with it, become a patent holder. If nothing else, just so you can drop that bomb at a cocktail party! "Oh by the way... I’m an INVENTOR." 👊💡#Invent #BeBold #Entrepreneur #Inventor

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Amazing things happen when women gather—even when it’s virtually. I’m proud to be a keynote speaker at today’s Texas Conference for Women to harness our collective wisdom and reaffirm our commitment to the work for gender equality. https://m-gat.es/2G694Tj

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Being the son of a Holocaust survivor is a very defining aspect of my identity that has shaped how I think and act. The way my dad treated others - with humanity, integrity, and authenticity - is how I try to build the foundation of everything I do. I’m honored to share my dad’s story with the world. Join us tonight at 6 p.m. ET on American Society for Yad Vashem’s Lessons from Our Parents' series.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: The New York Times noted that COVID has now killed more people this year than the scourges of HIV, malaria, influenza, and cholera — combined.GZERO Media #GraphicTruth looks at countries where the per-capita caseload has spiked recently.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: “Remote work is great. It’s the home-schooling and child care that ruins any chances of having a sane, normal workday.” The Wall Street Journal has been chronicling for months the pandemic's toll on work mothers. But now we know just how much of a Code Red the daily stresses of juggling child care, remote schooling, burnout, financial anxiety and, oh, a full-time job are--not just for women's careers, but the business world and the economy.The numbers from our exclusive on the biggest Covid-era study of work women and men are staggering, and they threaten to unravel the recent gains women have made in earning power and the management ranks: One in three work mothers say they are considering leaving the workforce or downshifting their careers. For mothers with young children, the share is even higher. The women who shared how they are managing daily life with Lauren Weber and me make it clear how much is at stake.A very special thanks to all of them and to McKinsey & Company and Lean In for their invaluable help in bringing The Wall Street Journal's 6th annual Women in the Workplace report to fruition! #WomenIn #wsjwomenin #WomenintheWorkplace

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: I have been going to the Anita Borg Institute for Women and Technology Grace Hopper Conference for the last 9 years so definitely missing the in person feeling this year! 😢 But, the gift it gave me was to reminisce all the impact we made together at #LinkedIn and in the community for #WomenInTech throughout the years. I remember our first booth was at a table and we started off small and then turned out in numbers over the years including #maleallies. Here are some pictures dating as far back as 2011 to last year.  What I miss most are the relationships built and the opportunities shared. Here's to celebrating all you powerful bada$$  #WomenInTech virtually and definitely thinking of you. Until we meet again taking over airplanes and halls...we got this! 💪🏼💙 #GHC2020 #GHC20 #LinkedInWIT #GraceHopperConference I have over 1k+ photos, but here are some! 📸Nicole Leverich Crystal Braswell Mohak Shroff Joshua Hartman Chris Pruett Sneha Keshwani Lily Sierra Mansi Modak Liz Li Soumya Mahadevan Aatif Awan Suja Viswesan Neha Narkhede Prachi Gupta Jo Chou Florina Xhabija Grosskurth Annabel Liu Amy Lokey Sarah Clatterbuck Igor Perisic Tanya Staples Parul Jain Yuliya Averbukh Aarthi J. Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: COVID has exacerbated economic inequity, which is why we’ve launched a global skills initiative to reimagine how people learn and apply new skills. To date, we’ve helped 10 million people who have lost their jobs gain digital skills for in-demand jobs, and as Ryan Roslansky explains, it’s just the start.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Putting people in a group doesn’t make them a team. A team is a collection of people with a shared identity who collaborate to achieve a common mission. Each member makes a unique contribution.Turning a group into a team starts with clarifying core values, goals, and roles.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: A very big thank you to every LinkedIn employee for helping secure this recognition from Business Insider Intelligence as the most trusted social platform for the fourth year running. To every LinkedIn member: Our work continues every day to remain worthy of your trust.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: It is a privilege.Exactly 10 years ago today, I made the best decision of my professional life, and joined LinkedIn.  In 2010, LinkedIn was often misunderstood as the “Lincoln” car dealership (by many people but esp my dad who has finally figured out the difference).  In other words, it was less of an obvious choice.  But what was obvious back then and still now, is the company is deeply rooted in a set of values that have guided the people it hires, the culture it nurtures and the millions of small and big business decisions we make every day. And while I did feel very privileged to join the company 10 years ago, every day since this feeling has become more pronounced for two reasons:My job.  I cannot imagine a job that more perfectly aligns with my personal values and what matters most in the world: ensuring that two people with equal talent have equal access to opportunity. My colleagues.  I cannot emphasize this enough. I have never worked with a group of people who have such clarity of conviction of why they wake up every day – and are driven to ensure that we live up to realizing our bold vision to create economic opportunity for every member of the globalworkforce.  Thanks @LinkedIn. It is truly a privilege. Big nod to @Blake Lawit also celebrating 10)

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: For us at Chargehound, it's been clear for a while that Pallavi Kuppa-Apte was an essential leader for the team but today we're making it official - she's our Chief Operating Officer. In early startups, you need to have great intelligence and an earnest curiosity to solve problems and grow the business.  Pallavi has both in spades, and has been with Chargehound from day one tackling challenges big and small with remarkable execution. I'm proud to work alongside her as part of the senior leadership team, and I know our merchants and partners will too. Many have been already for years!

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Today we're announcing that Vestaboard has closed a seed financing of $3.7 million and crossed $5 million in pre-orders. After shipping our first units to customers in August we are very close to starting mass production and shipping in earnest. This company - more than any other I've worked on - speaks to a lifelong quote I've admired  from WH Murray since I started my first company in the year 2000:Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initiative (and creation), there is one elementary truth – the ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then providence moves, too.Sometimes providence is slow, but it moves. Whatever initiative you are thinking of taking - that speaks to you from the heart - take it.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Congratulations to Jane Fraser who was named the next CEO of Citi this week and will become the first woman to lead a major financial firm in the United States. This achievement is not only a testament to her drive and talent, but also to the countless women who have paved the way for any of us who are the “first” to take on any role. I hope this inspires a generation of women to keep reaching for the greatest professional heights.

Thank you to all the FedEx team members involved in bringing this innovation to life.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: One of the things that has been minimized about my journey is how hard I’ve worked to achieve my dreams. For two decades I’ve barely gone out, you’ll rarely see me at events, I don’t have hobbies and I only just started work out. 😳 To reach great success takes a lot of sacrifice. I wouldn’t have it any other way, but it’s important to mention the degree of hard work that it will take to go after your dreams. It’s like a pact you will need to make with the Universe and yourself. The harder you work, the more the Universe will believe how serious you are about your goals and will then show up to help. Edison said success is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration. So true! One thing is for sure... everyday I’m hustlin’... still. #Entrepreneur #Hustle

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Meet Ty Ahmad-TaylorVP Product Marketing at FacebookTy is a visionary business leader. With a BS from Haverford College and a Masters in Journalism from Columbia University, Ty started his career as a reporter at The New York Times.  He then entered tech in 1996 as the Creative Director of @Home Networks for a few years before joining Comcast as Sr. Director of UI.  He was brought over to Viacom and became SVP Product Development & Strategy and after many years building other people's products he set off on his own as CEO & Founder of media aggregation site FanFeedr.  Samsung Electronics acquired FanFeedr in Oct. 2012 and Ty became the VP of SmartTV Services.  After a few years there he became the CEO & President of THX Ltd. and led the sale of the company to Razer Inc. Ty is on the board of GoPro & Consumer Technology Association.        *** Spotlight Series: Black Excellence ***Amazing business executives (who happen to be Black)---No more excuses about how folks "can't find" diverse talent to fill the C-Suite and board rooms. I hope this series will shine a light on just a few of the incredibly talented business executives that any company would be lucky to have on their team. #BlackLivesMatter#BlackExcellence#AllyIsAVerb#DiversityIsABusinessImperative

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: The coronavirus pandemic is disrupting our normal lives, and that includes the way Americans will vote in November. The U.S. is facing a record shortage of poll workers this year, since poll workers are often in an older demographic who are at high risk. Even in states where vote-by-mail is common, physical polling locations are still required, and poll workers are essential to making sure every vote is counted. That’s why we’re partnering with the nonpartisan @Civic Alliance and U.S. Election Assistance Commission to help the state and local election officials find poll workers and election volunteers to serve throughout the country. LinkedIn employees are able to take time off to volunteer at the polls, and many states even pay for your time. For more information on how you can help staff you local polling place, visit https://lnkd.in/ggPRNic.  #WorkThePolls

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Will "Future You" Forgive the Mistakes of "Past You"?One of my favorite sayings by my old friend Esther Dyson is, "Make new mistakes." But you're a constantly-changing person. Will the "you of the future" understand the decisions made by the "you of the past" - or even the "you of today"? Here's a way to think about the grace of forgiveness by the different versions of you. Thanks to Heather Shea and her amazing team at the United Palace for letting me contribute to the "View from the Heights" series.-gB

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: By nature, entrepreneurs are optimists. Nearly all of them think, “A lot of other people fail, but me, I'm going to win." It's a little bit like the 73% of Americans who believe that they are above-average drivers (a figure that rises to 79% if you just poll men).But while this optimism is essential to keep going in the face of major challenges, understanding the ins and outs of failure can increase the chances of success. In the latest episode of the Greymatter Podcast, I sat down with my Blitzscaling co-author Chris Yeh to discuss how and why startups fail, and how to avoid and recover from failure. I also share the biggest mistakes I made at my failed first startup, SocialNet.How have you recovered from your failures? Share your stories in the comments below.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: “Early-stage” investing covers a lot of territory, from incubation to seed, all the way to Series A. The criteria to use to assess whether a company is ready for a particular step can vary from market to market, or even from company to company. That’s why I sat down with my partner at Greylock, Sarah Guo, and Greylock’s Head of Content and Editorial, Heather Mack, to discuss the nuances of seed and Series A investing during today’s unusual environment. You’ll hear why some companies are ready for a Series A, even if they don’t have a lot of customers or revenues, what areas Greylock is looking at right now for early-stage investments, and how entrepreneurs can better connect with seed and Series A investors right now.https://lnkd.in/g8jfWNp

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: My wife Michelle and I are honored to support the Stanford Institute for Human-centered Artificial Intelligence (HAI) as it facilitates collaboration among a wide range of the University's researchers and scholars exploring ways to use AI to benefit humanity. HAI's first six grant recipients are exploring everything from wearable robotics that aid human locomotion and predict and prevent older people from falling to an active learning system that makes tax collection fairer and more efficient.  You can learn more about all six of these inaugural projects here: https://lnkd.in/gUyAqgm#stanforduniversity # #ai

Text: "In her award winning book Becoming, Obama states that her mother would always say, 'Michelle and Barack aren’t special. There are millions of Baracks and Michelle Obamas all over the world.' "  Thanks Yasna Vismale for sharing your story and these insights.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Dear friends,I wanted to share a career update with you. I have resigned from LinkedIn to pursue a role in public office.  As Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong has just announced, I will be joining the Singapore Cabinet as Minister of State for Ministry of Trade and Industry (Singapore) as well as the Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth (MCCY) I am humbled to be entrusted with this responsibility to serve my country during these extraordinary times.LinkedIn has been great to me. It’s been a privilege serving as a member of our leadership team and work alongside some of the most talented people in the industry. I will continue to keep in touch with my LinkedIn family and remain an active member of our LinkedIn alumni network.#Nextplay.

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: One of the most common questions I get to this day is… “when you started Spanx, what was your business plan?” Here’s my secret: I didn’t have one! No, really, I didn’t. I had never even taken a business class. Because I had no idea how it was supposed to be done, I kept it as simple as possible. I focused on 3 things: Make it, sell it, build awareness. I made the product, sold it to as many stores as I could and spent the rest of my time building excitement and awareness. Then I would repeat the cycle. That’s it! I see a lot of entrepreneurs with really great ideas freeze in their tracks because of their “lack of experience” or knowledge. But what you “don’t” know could be the very thing that sets you apart from all the rest. Follow your purpose. Lead with your story. Focus on the product… the rest will work itself out. #Entrepreneur #Business #SPANX

Name: Reid Hoffman
Text: Meeting you stopped me in my tracks running to catch a plane in Atlanta. We spoke, shook heads in disbelief at where our society was (even before today), and said we would continue to serve in every way we could.You encouraged the push for progress in a way no one can do justice in the way your iconic and legendary servitude has benefited our people. Thank you for your contributions, vision and steadfast commitment to us.Your impact is larger than life. Your op-Ed published today, as you’re laid to rest, reminds us to answer the calling of our hearts and stand up for what we truly believe in. And, we will. Rest In Peace and Power, Congressman John Lewis 🙏🏾#RestInPeace #JohnLewis#CivilRights#LifelongImpact #GoodTrouble

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: There’s no feeling worse than regret, and yet regret is the only truly self-inflicted and completely preventable emotion. A hospice nurse wrote a fascinating book, The Top Five Regrets of the Dying: A Life Transformed by the Dearly Departed, in which she identified the number one regret shared by the most people: They had lived someone else’s life and let fear impede their dreams. Failure did not even make the list. Love this medicine Gary Vaynerchuk delivers. Take heed - and know that’s its never too late to expunge regret and forgive yourself. Empathy starts with you, and if you won’t cut yourself some slack, you’re unlikely to do the same for others... #bestadvice #personaldevelopment #whatinspiresme #gettingthingsdone

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: For the past ten years, PureWow’s mission has been to celebrate women. And in 2020—more than ever before—that mission means honoring the voices work for change.We’ve partnered with Citi to create the “PureWow 20 in ’20,” a list that spotlights 20 up-and-coming leaders striving to make a meaningful impact. From the 18-year-old climate activist to the beauty mogul who started “Pull Up for Change,” these women are leading the way with one common goal: to make things better for all of us.The 20 in ’20 honorees were chosen based on the impact they’ve made this year in one of three pillars: equality, sustainability and workforce development (although many span all three). They were nominated by a panel of impressive judges: Cari Champion, host of the podcast “The Brownprint”, Squarespace's Kinjil Mathur, PureWow's own Mary Kate McGrath and Carla Zakhem-Hassan, head of marketing at Citi for whom supporting women is a core value.Huge thanks to Carla Zakhem-Hassan Anthony Michelini Diosselyn Johnston Kathryn P. Jordan Dennis Angela Pares Vashti V. Mary Kate McGrath Amanda Dobbs Rachel Berk and many others I'm missing here.

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: This video is the ultimate litmus test for whether you want to be an entrepreneur or want the romanticized version of the entrepreneur life.  There’s so much hero worship of entrepreneurs these days that we gloss over the tremendous effort it takes to be successful, the low odds regardless, and the daily assault on your self esteem. That’s why I love this straight talk from Kevin O'Leary on the pitfalls. It’s not meant to discourage; actually, it should do the opposite. If starting a business is your true destiny, watching this video should make you feel informed, not dejected. It’s just more data so there are no surprises.If after watching this, you're still fired up, let me know in the comments below.#entrepreneurship #business #bestadvice #sharktank

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: I don’t believe anyone’s hardships should be minimized just because their trials seem some orders of magnitude less severe than our own. We all struggle in our own ways. I did. You do. But what bonds us together is one simple truth: The quality of our lives is dictated not by the circumstances we are born into, not by what happened to us along the way, but by what happened next. That’s the one thing always entirely within our control - how we respond.I shared my personal and professional journey  on Entrepreneur Media's #HowSuccessHappens with Robert Tuchman. Link to listen in comments.

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: It’s clear that employee first businesses will win in the next decade. Tides are changing and people are evolving to value what really matters. There is no way for CEOs and business leaders to win if they don’t understand this shift...It’s part of the reason I surround myself with successful people who have empathy for others and understand this cold.Click the link in the comments to read more about this!

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: A lot people ask me, "How can someone maintain a professional LinkedIn presence?"I think the best way to do that is to shed the worry about being professional. The fact that’s even a question is what I think the insight is. I think you should be yourself on LinkedIn. By the way, on the record, I believe that will lead to more business, not less. Will there be a subset that eliminates you because "oh this is so unacceptable?"Maybe.By the way, that’s my career. I was very casual and I was crass on stage and, in the beginning, many people didn't accept me. But far more accepted me over the long term because they enjoyed truth and authenticity.

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: Practicality will always be there, I'm interested in your inner 🔥. What's even more interesting is, I believe that it's way more practical to go for the North Star of happiness when you're under 40. And yet, when people hit 18, 22, 28, 30, 35, they feel this huge pressure to "have it figured out". It's too bad and it's something I want to keep talking about. I really hope this brings some Monday Motivation to you.Make Monday something you look forward too!

Name: Gary Vaynerchuk
Text: Overreacting to people who don't really know you, friends of friends gossiping about you, comments on your posts or Twitter--is a huge, huge, HUGE, HUGE MISTAKE.Before you believe what people say about you, remember that they don't know you...but you do, and that's where the convo gets interesting.

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Flying solo on the first Dare to Lead Podcast. #BraveLeadersCourageousCulturesListen on Spotify.https://lnkd.in/e5Mgf5P

Name: Brené Brown
Text: One deeply human truth that's rarely acknowledged - especially at work - is that courage and fear are not mutually exclusive. Most of us feel brave and afraid all day long at the exact same time. And, during our really tough moments, when we're pulled between our fear and our call to courage, we need shared language. We need tools. We need skills. We need daily practices that can support us through these difficult rumbles.The goal of our Dare to Lead podcast is to create a place where we can learn (and unlearn) from each other. Welcome!Follow + listen for free on Spotify: https://lnkd.in/etDqpGG

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Burnout. We’re all there. It’s exhausting. The good news? There’s a path through it.In this episode of #UnlockingUs I talk to Drs. Emily and Amelia Nagoski about their book, Burnout.I’ve been practicing their 7 “complete the stress cycle strategies” since we recorded the podcast and I must say: Total game changer!HUGE learning for me: Dealing with the STRESSOR is just one part of dealing with burnout. The other part is dealing with the STRESS by completing the stress cycle and getting through that emotions tunnel.You can listen to our conversation at https://bit.ly/33UKQ7w

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Taking an amazing group of leaders through Dare to Lead right now. Today I was reminded of this finding from the research and how important it is to lead from a place of self-awareness.If we want people to fully show up and to bring their whole selves including their unarmored, whole hearts so that we can innovate, solve problems, and serve people, we have to be vigilant about creating a culture in which people feel safe, seen, heard, and respected. #daretolead

Name: Brené Brown
Text: So much fun news that I'm going to number it!1. I'm partnering with Spotify. Y'all can continue to listen for free AND there's going to be SO MUCH MUSIC.2. I'm launching a second podcast: Dare to Lead! Coming October 19th. I can't wait for us to dig into topics like trust, accountability, hard conversations, feedback . . . it's going to be real and actionable.3. Did I mention SO much music? Playlists, mini-mixtapes from guests. If you want to know how much music means to me and our family, check out our "formal" dining room.4. Love taking this wild ride with y'all. Suggestions for playlists, guests or topics are always welcome!Awkward, brave, and kind!

Name: Brené Brown
Text: The Gifts of Imperfection anniversary hardback edition and the new audiobook are out today!Yes, I'm reading the audiobook. Imperfectly, of course.10 years later and The Gifts is still a no bullshit zone!But I thought I'd show you how tempting it can be.Two big learnings over the past decade:1. Practicing the 10 guideposts is way harder than I thought.2. Practicing the 10 guideposts is way more important than I imagined.Celebrating with art prints, downloads, an assessment, and a webinar.Visit The Gifts hub here: https://bit.ly/3m3xRasThank y'all!

Name: Brené Brown
Text: We launched Season 1 with a conversation about FFTs — effing first times.We're launching Season 2 with a conversation about Day 2 — it's one of my favorite subjects (and least favorite challenges).Day 2 sounds easy enough, but the middle is NO JOKE. It's the messy middle — the point of no return. Join us as we talk about navigating what's next and why it's always best to stumble through uncertainty together.Listen here: https://bit.ly/32MZrQtPS: Thanks to our kick-ass team, transcripts for all past episodes are now available on the episode pages on brenebrown.com! We'll make these available 5-7 business days after each show airs. ❤️

Name: Brené Brown
Text: What’s the next step in our culture journey? Developing courageous leadership skills with help from Dr. Brené Brown. Read on and join us for this next phase of our exciting transformation journey. Brené Brown, Microsoft US accepts your dare to lead!#empathy #proximity #transformation #culture #DaretoLead #courage

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Always straddling the tension and trying not to tap out.Forever convincing ourselves that we can hold so many contradictory pieces and feelings.Not only are tension and contradictory pieces OK and normal — they're the magic sauce.Carl Jung called the paradox one of our most valued spiritual possessions and a great witness to the truth. He wrote, “Only the paradox comes anywhere near to comprehending the fullness of life.”Sometimes beautiful. Sometimes terrible. Always deeply human. ❤️

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Can you believe "The Gifts of Imperfection" was published 10 years ago?⁣⁣The research turned my life upside down and the book gave birth to our wonderful, wild, and truly wholehearted community. I’m grateful for both.⁣⁣We’re celebrating with a new hardcover edition and more. You can read about the celebration plans on the blog here: https://bit.ly/2XnHrul⁣“Owning our story and loving ourselves through that process is the bravest thing we’ll ever do.” xo, BB

Name: Brené Brown
Text: What an honor! Got to talk to one of my favorite people - Alan Alda. Grateful for his humor, empathy, and commitment to helping and supporting scientists.You can listen here or wherever you listen to your podcasts: bit.ly/3hNxTAf

Name: Brené Brown
Text: From FFTs to AMAs, we have had the best time on #UnlockingUs — and by the best, we mean the hardest and the most insightful 17 weeks we could imagine — especially as we face the COVID pandemic and join forces to fight for racial justice.It’s an honor to talk through and unlock some of what's happening in the world with you and our guests. Thank you!We are taking a summer hiatus for the next few weeks, but we’ll be back with more unlocking soon!As we start to plan the next season, who would you like to hear from? What would you like to talk about?Stay awkward, brave and kind! ❤️👊🏻❤️

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Damn. My dear friend Elizabeth Gilbert sees me. Her journal pages may need to come with warning labels. I had the same gut-punch-bear-hug feeling when my therapist told me that I needed to work on my "Let go and let Brené" approach to life. "Ouch and thank you" at the exact same time.

Name: Brené Brown
Text: I said, “Ask Me Anything,” and the #UnlockingUs community came through with the tough questions. To be honest, I thought I’d get some easy, fun ones—but no, all deep-end questions. In fact, we had hundreds and hundreds of tough, smart, thoughtful questions submitted, and in today’s episode I answer five of them. We cover ‘fake news,’ disappointment vs self-pity, religion and shame, when something is shame-worthy, and we’re just getting started.Episode here: https://bit.ly/38CH5nT

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Reese Witherspoon and Kerry Washington are two of my favorite creatives and storytellers. Their work is brave, honest, and deeply resonates.This is Part II of the Little Fires Everywhere episodes - Part I is an interview with author Celeste Ng. In this conversation we talk about how Reese and Kerry worked with a team to bring Celeste's words to life, and the challenges of creating authentic characters with complex internal thoughts.We also discuss motherhood, race, and how art connects us and changes us. LOVE these women and loved this conversation!Full episode here:https://lnkd.in/egUUkcw

Name: Brené Brown
Text: In this episode of #UnlockingUs, I talk to Judd Apatow, who has directed, produced, and written many of the biggest comedy films and hit TV shows of the last two decades - including one of my all time favorite movies, "The Big Sick."We look at what's funny, why it's funny, and why laughter creates connection. We also talk about his new film, "The King of Staten Island" and the thin line between humor and grief. What does it take to tell the stories of our lives in a way that allows us to recognize ourselves and our shared humanity?Listen to the full episode here: https://bit.ly/2NA1z7a

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Re-reading bell hooks, “All About Love” for the 20th time.  hooks explains that people who are willing to speak out against injustice are not smarter or kinder than their neighbors, but are “willing to live the truth of their values.”  If we believe in love as a value then our work becomes confronting lovelessness in all of its forms and fighting for love. I can’t think of a time in our country’s history where “living the truth of our values” hasn’t been considered dangerous and radical.  I was in the political social work concentration in grad school and we often talked about the differences between being agents of control and agents of change. I’m starting to wonder if hook’s concept of a “love ethic” isn’t one of the big variables that differentiates control (keep it comfortable and palatable) and real change (reimagine and rebuild the system). #loveisradical

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Hear that? If you listen to Unlocking Us you'll recognize the intro music, "Muy Podcasty" and the song that takes us out, "Oneder."In this episode you'll meet two of my favorite people: Carrie Rodriguez and Gina Chavez - the musicians who created and perform the music you hear every week on the podcast.Artists and activists, Gina and Carrie integrate stories, culture, and the heart of past generations into their music to create artful and hopeful futures. You can hear it in their music, and you can see it in their lives.I’m so grateful that our #UnlockingUs conversations begin and end with their soulful music.You can listen to the podcast AND their song, La Ultima Vez, here: https://bit.ly/2A0jMYl

Name: Brené Brown
Text: Only when diverse perspectives are included, respected, and valued can we start to get a full picture of the world: who we serve, what they need, and how to successfully meet people where they are.Daring leaders fight for the inclusion of all people, opinions, and perspectives because that makes us all better and stronger. That means having the courage to acknowledge our own privilege, and staying open to learning about our biases and blind spots. It's also listening, centering, and honoring stories that reflect experiences that are different than our own.Courage is listening, learning, unlearning, knowing when to lead, and knowing when to let others lead.
